loans.name: Roque

texts.en: Roque lives in Katipunan, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. He is married with five children. His wife is a vendor while he manages their farm, which is their main source of income. Roque borrowed a loan from Gata Daku MPC, which he joined recently to cover the labor cost of weeding and plowing his farm expansion. He wants to expand and improve his farm in order to generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to cover the labor cost of weeding and plowing his farm expansion

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Lilibeth, a 44-year-old married mother of six children, all of whom are in school, works very hard to provide for them. For 11 years Lilibeth has been running a general store in the Philippines that sells a variety of items such as shampoo, soap, snack food, biscuits, noodles, charcoal, other groceries. She has requested a PHP 50000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional grocery products to sell.

In the future, Lilibeth would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery products to sell.

loans.name: Musu

texts.en:
Musu is a 40-year-old single mother of four children between the ages of 6 and 25, only three of whom are presently in school and living at home. A resident of Logan Town, one of the early communities in Liberia that is well-known, Musu ended her education at the 6th grade.


For the past five years Musu has been running a shop where she sells charcoal, a business she began with the little money she had saved. She likes her enterprise because she makes good profits and it keeps she busy. Now requesting a loan to buy more charcoal to sell, her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Sokea

texts.en:
Sokea is married and the mother of one child. The family lives in the Sampov Meas district of Pursat province. Her husband works as security guard. She helps cover the cost of daily living by farming rice on a five-hectare field. For the past three years this couple has also rented out a loudspeaker to make additional money. The rental fee comes to about 42,000 KHR a day. As a new client of VisionFund, Kiva’s partner, Sokea is applying for a 2,000,000 KHR loan in order to buy equipment to support the couple's loudspeaker business. 

Sokea hopes to earns more income from her business.

loans.use: to buy equipment to support the couple's loudspeaker business

loans.name: Wilberforce

texts.en:
Wilberforce is a 52 years old and married, with six children.  He lives in Hoima, Uganda.

He runs a beer and soda depot, and he has been in business for five years now. He also gets additional income from farming. 

Wilberforce describes himself as hardworking.  He dreams of building a permanent house for his family, but inadequate capital is hindering the growth of his business.  He is requesting a loan to buy more beer and soda to sell.

loans.use: to buy beer and soda to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to remodel the interior and exterior of his house.

loans.name: Zunilda

texts.es:
Zunilda es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, una mujer muy dedicada, que por medio de sus ventas esta saliendo adelante. Este es su segundo crédito en Kiva, y cuenta que por medio de su crédito anterior ha podido surtir su negocio y ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
Hoy solicita de un nuevo crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de arroz, fideos, yerba, panificados, carnes y demás insumos y de esa forma poder seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes lo que buscan. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Zunilda is from the city of San Lorenzo. She is a very dedicated lady whose sales are moving forward. This is her second credit from Kiva, and she says that her last credit has allowed her to stock her business and given her the ability to offer a greater variety to her clients.

Today, she is seek a new credit to allow her to buy rice, noodles, tea, baked goods, meats, and more supplies in order to continue offering her clients what they are looking for. She is thankful for this new opportunity that she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy rice, noodles, tea, baked goods, meats and more supplies.

loans.name: Los Del Huaycho Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento LOS DEL HUAYCHO, Está  compuesto por nueve integrantes seis mujeres y tres varones,  el  presidente del banco es el Sr. Freddy tiene 32 años, tiene dos hijos,   el se dedica al servicio de transporte de pasajeros  es cliente antiguo de la institución, saco los anteriores créditos siempre para mejorar vehículo, el Sr. Freddy va a usar este préstamo para la compra de llantas para su vehículo, el Sr. Freddy es una persona  con ganas de superación se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse y mantener a su familia, también se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado a el y a sus compañeras  de grupo.
texts.en: The “Los del Huaycho” communal bank is comprised of nine members, six ladies and three gentlemen.  Freddy, the bank’s president, is 32 years old and has two children. He is engaged in a passenger transport service.  He is a former client of the institution and he always took out previous loans to improve his vehicle.  Freddy is going to use this vehicle to purchase tires for his vehicle.  Freddy is a person that wants to succeed.  He feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support they provide because it is the only activity that allows him to support himself and his family.  In addition, he feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support given to him and his fellow group members.

loans.use: to purchase tires.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Guapa está en su ciclo número  octavo del programa de comité, kuña guapa quiere decir mujer trabajadora en guaraní, ya que eso es lo que estas mujeres son. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde cada una sabrá la situación que tienen.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ramona quien en su última encuesta mostro un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno. Ella es Herrera y comenta que siempre esta con muchos pedidos y trabajos que le hacen sus clientes. Es una persona con mucho valor y entusiasmo, ha venido ayudando a su familia por medio de este trabajo y quiere poder seguir haciéndolo.
La Sra. Ramona solicita de este crédito para la compra de Hierros, pinturas, varillas lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: The group called Kuña Guapa is in its eighth cycle of the communal bank program. "Kuña guapa" means a hardworking woman in Guaraní, and that is just what these women are. They are taking the poverty elimination survey, so each one of them will know her own situation. One of the members of the group is Ramona, who, in her last survey, demonstrated a poverty level within level one. She is a blacksmith and comments that she always has many orders and jobs from her clients. She is a very brave and enthusiastic person who has been helping her family by means of her job, and wants to be able to continue doing so. Ramona is requesting this loan to buy irons, paints, and rods. This will help her to make her business plan concrete and in turn, increase her income.

loans.use: to buy irons, paints, and rods

loans.name: Jovenes Unidos En Cristo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Jóvenes Unidos en Cristo está en su ciclo número  1 del programa de comité de jóvenes, ellos están con muchas ganas de poder empezar a trabajar y poder sentirse útiles cada uno en sus respectivas labores.
La señorita Lissi se desempeña como vendedora de ropas en las cercanías de su casa. Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de variadas prendas  para  aumentar la variedad de su pequeño negocio, ya que quiere poder seguir invirtiendo y de esa forma poder sentirse útil y aportar un pequeño ingreso a la casa.
texts.en:
The group called Jóvenes Unidos en Cristo (Youth United in Christ) is in its first cycle in the youth committee program of their communal bank.  They have great desires to start working and be able to feel useful in their various jobs.  Lissi works selling clothing near her house.

She is asking for a loan to buy various clothes so she can increase the variety of her small business.  She wants to continue to invest in her business and in this way be able to feel useful and contribute to her household's income.

loans.use: buy various types of clothing to sell.

loans.name: El Aguacate  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo El Aguacate está formado por 6 socias y 2 socios quienes viven por los alrededores de Monay en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió, su arquitectura es una mezcla de lo moderno y lo colonia, esta bañada por 4 ríos, su gastronomía es muy variada, es cuna de grandes artistas al igual que deportistas. Su gente es amable y gentil de un corazón muy cálido que lucha el día a día para mejorar la estabilidad economía de sus hogares para darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos, aun guardan celosa mente su cultura y tradiciones.


Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Mercedes, esta realizando su sexto crédito a lado de sus vecinas y amiga del grupo de crédito El aguacate, esta forma de créditos le gusta porque así va creciendo poco a poco en su actividad económica y afianza la amistad con todas sus compañeras.

La Señora Mercedes tiene 65 años, es viuda y tiene 5 hijos mayores de edad, cuatro de ellos son casados y viven independientes, su hijo soltero vive en su casa y le ayuda  económicamente. La casa en la que vive es fruto de su trabajo.

Doña Mercedes se dedica a la atención de su tienda de domingo a domingo sin horario fijo, como vive en el campo también cultiva y lo que cosecha vende y es para el consumo de su casa, también cría gansos, patos, cuyes, cerdos, vacas. 

Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de víveres para su tienda y en el alimento para sus animales. 

Su sueño es agrandar su tienda.

La foto pequeña es de dos socias y un socio que pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The El Aguacate group is made up of 6 women and 2 men who live around Monay in the city of Cuenca. This city has a cold climate and its architecture is a blend of modern and colonial. It is bathed in 4 rivers and its cuisine is varied. It is the cradle of great artists and athletes. Its people are kind, friendly and warmhearted. They fight day to day to improve the financial stability of their homes to give a better future to their children while they jealously guard their culture and traditions. 

One of the members of the group is Mercedes. She is taking out her sixth loan with her neighbors and friends from the El Aguacate group. She likes this kind of a loan because this way she grows her economic activity little by little and engages friendship with all of the other members. 

Mercedes is 65 years old. She is a widow and has 5 grown children. Four of them are married and on their own. Her single son lives at home and helps her financially. The house she lives in is the result of her work.

Mercedes works in her store Sunday to Sunday with no set schedule. Since she lives in the country, she also farms and what she harvests she sells and uses for household consumption. She also raises geese, ducks, guinea pigs, pigs and cows. 

She is going to invest in buying grocery items for her store and in animal feed. Her dream is to enlarge the store. 

The small photo is of two women and a man who are members who couldn't be there when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy grocery items and animal feed.

loans.name: Derky

texts.es: Derky tiene 22 años de edad, es soltero y vive en la casa de sus padres en compañía de ellos y sus hermanos. Derky es mecánico, se dedica exclusivamente a la reparación de motos lineales y motokares, hace 2 años que viene dedicándose a esta actividad, trabaja junto a su tío en su pequeño taller, siendo muy joven aun el paso por muchos problemas económicos para poder salir adelante, ya que tuvo que trabajar para estudiar, es así como empezó a trabajar en diferentes talleres para lograr tener experiencia y de esa manera poder independizarse, es así que poco a poco esta ahorrando y comprando sus propias herramientas, para tener un negocio mucho mejor. Como actividad complementaria realiza trabajos como chofer de camiones, transportando carga a la costa, percibiendo un ingreso extra que le ayuda a mejorar su nivel de vida y el de su familia. Este es su primer crédito con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. El dinero solicitado de S/.600.00 lo invertirá en la compra de herramientas que utiliza en su trabajo a diario.
texts.en: Derky is 22. He is single and lives in his parents' house with his parents and siblings. Derky is a mechanic who exclusively repairs traditional motorcycles and moto-carts. He has been doing this for two years. He works with his uncle in his small workshop. Even though he is very young, he has already experienced many economic problems. He has had to work in order to study; this is how he started working in various workshops in order to gain experience and become independent. Bit by bit, he is saving up and buying his own tools in order to have a much better business. As a complementary activity, he also works as a truck driver, transporting cargo to the coast. This makes him an additional income that helps him to improve his and his family's living standards. This is his first loan with Kiva and he is grateful for the financial support. He promises to repay his quotas punctually. He will invest the requested 600 soles in the purchase of work tools that he will use in his daily work.

loans.use: to buy tools for his mechanic shop.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is 42 years old and married with five children.

Arlene works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more items like detergent, snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. She has been in this business for eleven years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Arlene aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items like detergent, snack foods, canned goods and other groceries.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a 29-year-old married man with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His main business is welding alongside operating a video library and farming in order to boost his income. He faces challenges of limited capital and inefficient electricity supply, however, he has a vision of completing his house and owning a modern workshop. Robert is requesting a loan to buy another welding machine.

loans.use: to buy another welding machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of groceries for resale

loans.name: Cresenciana

texts.en:
Cresenciana is 54 years old, married and has two children. 

Cresenciana is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Cresenciana requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Cresenciana has been raising pigs for six years now, and has borrowed 27 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Cresenciana would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius used the previous loan to buy maize flour to sell. After realizing the lucrative nature of the produce business, he has decided to specialize in maize sales since he has been able to reap a lot of profits. Like all good fathers, he dreams of seeing his children graduate with degrees and have good paying jobs.

He has the hardship of price fluctuation and high transportation costs from the farmers to the market due to a poor road network. His ambition is to diversify into home-use products since the produce business has peak and off seasons. Julius is requesting a loan to buy maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize flour to sell.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 42-year-old married man with seven children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His main business is selling local brew which he brews himself but also buys from others, alongside farming in order to boost his income. Inadequate capital and price fluctuations are his major challenges while his dream is educating his children to higher levels of learning and expanding his business to new markets. Joseph intends to use the loan to buy local brew to sell.

loans.use: to buy local brew to sell.

loans.name: Yozeph

texts.en: Yozeph is a 49-year-old married man with five children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His main business is crop production, alongside retail in order to boost his income. He faces challenges of inadequate capital and prolonged drought, however, he has a vision of building a permanent house for a residence and expanding his farming activities. Yozeph is requesting a loan to buy onions and Irish potatoes to plant.

loans.use: to buy onions and Irish potatoes to plant.

loans.name: Avtandil

texts.en:
Avtandil is 55 years old, living in the village of Geguti. He is married and lives with his spouse in their own house. The only income source for the family is money transfers from abroad, where their relatives live and work. That’s why Avtandil decided to apply for this credit and start his own business.

He is very grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders are offering him, since thanks to their help he will be able to purchase all the needed materials for greenhouse construction. He plans to grow various greens and vegetables and sell the harvest at the local open market. Thanks to this loan, he will improve their quality of life and increase family income. Avtandil awaits your support.

loans.use: to build a greenhouse

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is 33-year-old vigorous, married woman and a mother of four children. She has had a business of hand-embroidery for the past 10 years. She is zealous about her work, and client demand is strong.  Her husband does not earn enough to support his family alone.

Shazia’s embroidery patterns are very popular on her street and she is the best earning resource in her household. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of Rs 25,000 to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins and pearls in large quantities to meet the increasing demand. She hopes to get a boost in her earnings and wishes to spend the part of profits on the expansion of her business. She is in her third loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as thread, sequins and pearls.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Meet Grace, a businesswoman from Liberia; to be precise, she lives in Logan Town, one of the early communities  in Liberia that is well-known. She is 53 years of age, married, and has a 30-year-old child. 

Grace stopped her education at the fifth grade. For the past 23 years she has been involved in business. Presently she is selling rice, peppers, Vita, oil, etc. in the local market for nine hours each day from Monday to Saturday.  She started her business with a little money from her child in order to help her. She learned this ways of selling from her friends.  

Grace enjoys the flow of her customers. She is requesting a loan to buy more rice, peppers, Vita, oil, etc. for her business.  Her plan is to build a house. She thanks BRAC Liberia for lending her money.

loans.use: to buy more rice, peppers, Vita, oil, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Mujeres De La Bahía  (Azogues) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Mujeres de la Bahía está formado por 8 socias y 1 socio quienes viven en la ciudad de Azogues, esta ciudad tiene una geografía inclinada, su centro es una mezcla de lo colonial y lo moderno, cuenta con varios atractivos turísticos para disfrutar con la familia. Su gente al igual que las socias labora en la crianza de animales, agricultura y comercio, su gente tiene manos muy hábiles quienes aun realizan las artesanías que ya son toda una tradición, conservan la cultura que les inculcaron sus padres y su gastronomía es muy variada.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María Juana, tiene 43 años de edad y es soltera, vive en una casa arrendada.

Ella es oriunda de la provincia de Riobamba pero desde hace algunos años vive en la ciudad de Azogues  por motivos de trabajo, se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de ropa desde hace 10 años, trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo ya que cuenta con su local propio. 

Su nuevo crédito va ser invertido en la compra de ropa para incrementar su mercadería.

Las dos fotos pequeñas son de dos socias que no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomo la foto del grtupo.

Su meta es agrandar  más su negocio.
texts.en:
The loan group, Mujeres de la Bahía, is made up of 8 female members and 1 male member who live in the city of Azogues. This city has an inclined geography. Its center is a mix of the colonial and the modern. It has various tourist attractions to enjoy with the family. Its people, just like the members of the group, work in raising animals, agriculture, and commerce. Its people have very competent hands that produce the crafts that are already a tradition, conserve the culture that their parents instilled in them, and the gastronomy is very varied.

One of the members of this group is María Juana. She is 43 years old and single. She lives in a rented house. 

She is native to the province of Riobamba, but she has lived for some years in the city of Azogues for work. She has made a living selling all types of clothing for 10 years. She works Sunday to Sunday without a fixed schedule since she has her own shop.

Her new loan will be invested in the purchase of clothing to increase her merchandise.  Her goal is to make her business even bigger.

The two small photos are of the two members that could not be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to purchase clothing.

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en:
Shehnaz is 41 years old and works from home as a tailor. She has been in this line of work for four years now and is proud to be contributing to her household income. When Shehnaz was not earning, her family was going through a severe financial crisis that compelled her to use her stitching skills in a productive manner. Her husband was the sole breadwinner of the family. Shehnaz felt it obligatory to change her family’s living standards and started working from home. 

Shehnaz is a brave woman and her hard work helped her establish a good clientele. Recently, she contacted Kashf Foundation and requested a loan of Rs. 25,000. It will help her to purchase reels of thread with packs of buttons, laces and zippers in different colors. She hopes to generate more income by completing orders of her customers on time. She is in her third loan cycle with good repayment history.

loans.use: to purchase reels of thread with packs of buttons, laces and zippers in different colors.

loans.name: Divinah

texts.en: Divinah is a 26-year-old woman. She has two children. She describes herself as honest. She operates a retail shop where she sells sugar, maize flour and other items. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. Her business is located in an area that is accessible and her primary customers are individuals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of enough capital. She will use the KES 60,000 loan to add stocks of sugar, maize flour and other household items. Her business goal is to have a wholesale shop within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will own a piece of land. This is her third loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: add stocks of sugar, maize flour, and other household items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, allowing her to sell greater quantities of jewelry.

loans.name: Maria Jose

texts.es:
María José es una mujer que ya culmino su básica secundaria y desea estudiar y ejercer estética corporal y facial ya que la apasiona este tema.
Ella terminó sus estudios hace poco y después de esto, empezó a hacer un curso de estética corporal donde se dio cuenta que esto era lo que verdaderamente la apasionaba y era en lo que realmente quería ejercer, por lo tanto  decidió estudiar y buscar  un sito  donde realmente valiera la pena  y donde terminara con un titulo que le ayudara a ejercer su carrera por tal razón decidio estudiar en Campoalto, ya que el gran sueño de ella es poder montar muy bien su spa y que tenga incluido un gimnasio, o trabajar en un hospital donde pueda ganar bien. 
Aparte de esto ella quiere estudiar mercadeo pues es algo que ella tiene pensado hacer después de culminar su programa de Cosmetología y Estetica, ya que  tiene que trabajar para financiar sus estudios, a María José también le gusta el mercadeo porque sabe que es una mujer de negocios y después de un tiempo ella quiere ejercer en su spa desde la parte administrativa. María José actualmente trabaja con su hermano vendiendo zapatos en un almacén pero ella tiene claro que debe seguir con sus estudios para llegar a ser una gran profesional. María José sabe que con la ayuda de Dios todo se puede lograr y también tiene claro que aún tiene mucho tiempo por aprovechar para estudiar y realizar todos sus sueños para darle una vida de calidad a los hijos que desea tener en un futuro estable. La familia de María José la apoya para estudiar pero no cuentan con los recursos necesarios para pagarle un carrera por tal razón ella debe trabajar y forjar sus metas. Ella es María José una mujer llena de sueños.
texts.en:
Maria Jose completed high school and wants to study to become a face and body aesthetician since she likes that field.

She completed school a short time ago and after that began to study aesthetics where she realized that this is her passion and she really wanted to do, so she decided to study this and look for a place where this would be worthwhile and decided to study in Campoalto.  She wants to set up a good spa with a gym, or to work in a hospital where she can earn good money.

Besides aesthetics, she also wants to study marketing because it’s something she wants to do after completing the cosmetology and aesthetics program, since she has to work in order to pay for her studies.  Maria Jose also likes marketing very much because she knows that she is a businesswoman and after a while wants to start her spa from the management side.  Maria Jose currently works with her brother, selling shoes in a shop, but of course she needs to continue her studies so she can become a great professional.  Maria Jose knows that everything can be accomplished with God’s help and she is also clear that she still has a lot of studying to do in order to realize all of her dreams so she can have a stable future and provide a good quality of life to the children she wants to have someday.  Maria Jose’s family supports her with her studies, but they don’t have the necessary resources to pay for all of her studies, so she has to work to forge her goals.  She is Maria Jose, a woman full of dreams.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Cindy Paola

texts.es:
Cindy vive con su hermana y con su mamá; actualmente se encuentra estudiando técnico en contabilidad financiera, siempre ha vivido con su mamá y le agradece el hecho que se haya hecho cargo de ella se ha hecho que nacíó, todo el tiemp le ha dado lo que ha necesitado. Hasta el momento ella es una mujer independiente y trabaja en una panadería y bueno la verdad es que sus ingresos no son muy altos lo cual le dificulta un poco cancelar las cuotas de la Universidad donde estudia Cindy.  Cindy al ser mayor de edad lo que pretende es ubicarse en un trabajo que le permita ayudar a su mamá y sus hermanas pequeñas, sabe que eso lo logra preparandose. De ese modo Cindy puede aportar asumiendo el pago de su estudio y ayudando con algunos gastos propios del hogar.
Hace dos años hizo parte de un programa que ofrecía técnicos por competencia en el campo laboral, se inscribió y pasó; gracias  a este programa logro aumentar sus conocimientos en todo lo que tiene que ver con una carrera como lo es contaduría publica y desde hace ya un año ingreso a la corporación a ampliar sus conocimientos en la cual se  ha  sentido muy a gusto ya que le brinda una calidad de aprendizaje muy buena y se acomoda a ella como persona, y ahora que tiene la oportunidad de hacer algo para su bienestar no piensa en abandonar y así poder  darle una ayuda a su mamá.  Cindy se inclina hacia los deportes le gusta hacer ejercicio, leer y colaborar en la casa, también le gusta participar en  obras teatrales o estar involucrada con todo lo que tenga que ver con cultura y las artes en general, ya que le gustaría hacer parte de una academia y estudiar artes escénicas en un futuro y poder realizarse como una gran actriz y una contadora profesional reconocida como una mujer emprendedora y con un gran deseo de colaborar con los mas necesitados del  país y poder contribuir con fundaciones no solo ella sino también con la colaboración de muchas personas que quieran apoyar al futuro del país.
texts.en:
Cindy lives with her sister and her mother. She is currently studying for a technical degree in financial accounting. She has always lived with her mom, and she is grateful to her for giving birth to her and taking care of her. Cindy's mom has always given her what she needs. Currently Cindy's mom is an independent woman who works in a bakery, although in truth her income is not very high, which makes it somewhat difficult for her to cover the fees of the university where Cindy studies. Being an adult now, Cindy plans to find a job which will allow her to help her mother and her little sisters. She is preparing herself to do this successfully, Cindy can contribute, paying for her own studies and helping with some of the household expenses. 

Two years ago, she took part in a program which offered technical training to compete in the labor market. She signed up and passed; thanks to this program she was able to broaden her knowledge in all areas having to do with a career such as public accounting. One year ago, she entered the institution to broaden her knowledge, and she has felt very satisfied there, since it provides a very good quality of learning and accommodates her as a person. Now that she has the opportunity to do something for her well-being, she is not about to abandon it, and in this way she can provide help to her mom. 

Cindy enjoys sports and likes to exercise, read and help out in the house. She also likes to participate in theater productions or to be involved in anything having to do with culture or the arts in general. She would like to be part of an academy and study theater arts in the future, so that she can become a great actress as well as a professional accountant and be recognized as an enterprising woman. She also has a great desire to help the most needy in the country and be able to contribute to foundations, not only by herself but working with many people who want to improve the country's future.

loans.use: to pay for her technical education in financial accounting.

loans.name: Adèle

texts.fr:
Adèle est mariée et mère de trois enfants, elle est âgée de 29 ans et vie dans le quartier de Ségbé Viépé.
Elle  vend des chaussures, habits pour enfants et des habits imperméables.
Ce crédit lui permettra d'acheter 2 douzaines de chaussure et 2 douzaines de tapettes afin d’augmenter son revenu. Vu la période de pluie et la rentrée scolaire qui s’annoncent elle peut satisfaire ses clients et pouvoir financer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Adèle is married and the mother of three children. She is 29 and lives in the  Ségbé Viépé district. She sells shoes, children's clothing, and rain gear. 

This loan will permit her to buy two dozen pairs of shoes and two dozen flipflops so as to increase her income. Since children will soon be going back to school and the rainy season will begin, she will be able to satisfy her customers and pay for school fees for her own children.

loans.use: to buy two dozen pairs of shoes and two dozen pairs of flipflops.

loans.name: Angie Lizeth

texts.es:
Ella es Angie entró a estudiar en el 4 semestre se dirige a ustedes con el fin de renovar el crédito que kiva le aprobó y le brindó el semestre pasado, nuevamente se presenta para que por favor le vuelvan a hacer el préstamo ya que el semestre anterior le fue de gran ayuda, ya se encuentra muy cerca de finalizar su primer objetivo y lo que espera es poder crecer profesionalmente; su  historia es:

Es una joven de 18 años, le encanta el dibujo, la música y leer, le fascina jugar fútboll, la publicidad  y  está estudiando dos carreras en la actualidad lo cual ocupa todo su tiempo y no le permite ocuparse laboralmente para apoyar a su estudio económicamente,son sus padres quienes en la actualidad le aportan todos los recursos de orden monetario que ella requiere para poder continuar adelante con sus dos carreras y lograr lo que se ha propuesto y de verdad necesita nuevamente su ayuda. Quiere que por favor le ayuden de nuevo para este semestre, ustedes ya conocen su historia, sus logros, sus metas, lo que ha hecho, ella anhela verse como profesional en 4 años en amabas carreras y sabe que con su ayuda lo puede hacer.  De este modo puede colaborarle a sus padres de cierta forma, ella espera contar su apoyo, espera su respuesta muchas gracias.
texts.en:
This is Angie, who has started her fourth semester of school and is, once more, asking for support from Kiva, like that which allowed her to pay for her previous semester.  She is asking for a new loan, since the previous semester was of great help and she is very close to achieving her first objective and expects to grow professionally.  Her story is:

She is 18 years old and loves drawing, music, and reading.  She likes playing soccer and is studying two tracks which takes up all her time and doesn’t allow her to work to pay for her studies.  Her parents currently support her with everything financially so she can continue working on her careers and do what she has set out to do.  She needs your help once more this semester.  You already know her story, her accomplishments, her goals, what she has done, and she really wants to see herself as a professional with two careers in four years.  She knows that she can do it with your help.  In this way she can help her parents in certain ways.  She hopes to get your support and awaits your answer.  Thank you very much.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Rosely

texts.en:
Rosely is 41 years old, married, and has two children who are in school.

Rosely is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Rosely requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. Rosely has been farming rice for 15 years now, and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosely would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Yuri

texts.es: Yuri proviene de un hogar muy humilde carente de muchas cosas, y con un padre poco responsable sumadre vivió con él después de su nacimiento durante cinco años más y luego se separaron porque él padre les daba mala vida, no cumplía con su responsabilidad ademas de maltrato que les causaba; su madre decidió darse una nueva oportunidad con otro señor que aparentemente las quería, después de 6 largos años la convivencia con este señor se hizo imposible por sus malas intenciones con Yuri, de este modo con tan solo 13 años de edad decidió abandonar su casa y con el apoyo de su abuela materna hacer una nueva vida. En una ciudad pequeña no importa la edad solo importa las ganas de trabajar para emplear a alguien y eso le sucedió a ella, así que se vio obligada a dejar sus estudios en el colegio y emplearse, esto se prolongo por un año mientras se reponía de todos los daños que este señor le había ocasionado en cuestión de ropa, libros del colegio y calzado, entre otros luego de ese tiempo decidió ingresar a estudiar validando los dos años que me faltaban (décimo y once), con el dinero que se ganaba compro útiles, uniformes y matricula, acordó con su jefe en ese entonces que le permitiera trabajar hasta las seis de la tarde para entrar al colegio a las seis treinta, este aceptó y así logró terminar su secundaria. Posterior a ello viajó a una ciudad capital y un amigo le dio la oportunidad de trabajar en un local pequeño de accesorios en donde conoció a quien hoy día es su esposo. Su gran anhelo es poder terminar la carrera que cursa actualmente con el fin de lograr mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia, agradece a su esposo quien siempre la ha apoyado y no la ha dejado desfallecer en su intento de salir adelante, considera que el estudio es la mejor inversión que puede hacer y por eso se esfuerza para conseguirlo, ademas de ser el mejor ejemplo para su hija de 5 años. sabe que Kiva es la mejor opción que tiene y por eso recurre a su apoyo.
texts.en:
Yuri comes from a humble home and lacks many things.  Her mother separated from her irresponsible father five years after [Yuri] was born because he provided a bad life.  He did not meet with his responsibilities and mistreated them.  Her mother decided to give herself a new opportunity with another man who seemed like he loved them, but after six long years, life became unbearable with this man because of his bad intentions with Yuri, so she decided to run away at age 13 and create a new life with her grandmother’s help.

In a small town age doesn’t matter, only the desire to work.  She saw the need to quit school and work.  She did this for a year while she recovered from all the damage that the man had done to her regarding clothing, school books, and shoes.  After that she decided to go back to school and finish the final two grades, (10 and 11).  She bought school supplies, uniforms, and paid tuition with the money she earned and made a deal with her boss so she could work until 6:00 pm so she could attend school at 6:30 pm.  This allowed her to finish high school.

After this she went to the capital and a friend gave her the opportunity to work in a small accessories shop where she met her husband.  Her greatest desire is to be able to finish studying for the career that she is studying for, so that her family will have a better quality of life.  She is grateful to her husband because he has always backed her and he has not interfered with her desire to get ahead.  She feels that education is the best investment that can be made, so she makes an effort to get one.  She is also an example to her five year old daughter.  She knows that Kiva is the best option she has and she is asking for your help.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Mujeres De La Cumbre Group

texts.es:
La señora Manuela de estado civil casada, de 44 años de edad, curso los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 6 hijos y 4 de ellos estan estudiando, se dedica a la crianza de animales de corral, inició este negocio con una docena de pollos, a la fecha lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y decide solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de aves de corral, espera en el futuro contar con una granja de pollos para poder venderlos por mayor. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales y al bordado.
texts.en: Manuela is married, 44 years old and had 6 years of primary education. She has 6 children, four of whom are still in school. Her work involves raising farm animals, starting this business with a dozen chickens. She has acquired 10 years of experience to date. She leads a team, and is applying for a loan in order to purchase fowl. In the future she hopes to have a poultry farm in order to be able to sell wholesale. The other team members work in animal husbandry and embroidery.

loans.use: to purchase fowl

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase plastic containers and more sewing materials for her sewing works.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional amounts of groceries.

loans.name: Deo

texts.en: Deo is a 44-year-old married man with 2 children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His main business is selling firewood alongside brick making. Unpredictable weather changes and inadequate capital hinder his business plans of trading in solar products after accumulating enough capital. Deo is requesting a loan to buy firewood to sell.

loans.use: to buy firewood to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer, and compost, among others, for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Kebbeh

texts.en:
Kebbeh is 38 years old and lives in Logan Town, one of the well-known early communities in Liberia. She is married and has four children between the ages of 14 and 19. Only three are presently in school and live at home. She herself was unfortunate and could not attend school. 

She mentioned, "I've managed my business well for the past six years now without encountering any problem." She started this business with small goods given to her on loan from her father, and she manages to turn the sale into a big one. She learned this way of trading from her father. She is very happy with her business because she makes a lot of profit and it provides cash for her expenses. She is proud of her business because it makes her popular. She described herself as a hardworking woman. 

Kebbeh has requested a loan to purchase more fashionable blouses, jeans, etc. for her business. Her plan is to build a decent house for her children. She thanks the supporters of BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to purchase more fashionable blouses, jeans etc. for her business.

loans.name: Arshaluis

texts.en:
Arshaluis is 27 years old, married, and living with his wife, parents, brother and a child in the Ninotsminda district. The source of income for the family is the monthly salaries of Arshaluis’s parents. His father is an electrician and his mother works as a cleaner to earn a living. Arshaluis is a very energetic young man and wishes to be financially independent and provide the family with better living conditions. That’s why he decided to apply for the credit and start a taxi business.

His loan request was approved under the framework of the Startup program, which is the joint project of MFO Credo and Kiva. With the received amount, Arshaluis will purchase a secondhand car and transport passengers from his district to Yerevan. His district is mainly populated with Armenians and there is a high demand for traveling in Armenia. Arshaluis hopes his project will be profitable and generate income to satisfy the daily needs of his family.

loans.use: to purchase a car to use as a taxi.

loans.name: Rene Rolando

texts.es: René, tiene 37 años de edad, esta casado, tiene 3 hijos y vive en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida.  El lleva 11 años de vender fruta de temporada como es actualmente el rambután, en otras temporadas vende, cocos, nances y otras frutas. El puesto de venta lo tiene en la orilla de la carretera, es una zona de alto movimiento de venta de frutas. Ha solicitado un segundo préstamo por  8,000  Lempiras con el cual va comprar mas fruta de rambután para aprovechar la temporada y obtener ingresos. Su sueño es terminar de construir su casa, y crecer en el negocio para mejorar la calidad de vida en su familia.
texts.en:
René is 37 years old, is married, has three children and lives in the municipality of Tela, Atlantida. He has been selling seasonal fruit for 11 years. Right now it is rambutan, in other seasons he sells coconuts, nance (a small yellow fruit) and other fruits. His sales stand is beside the highway in a busy fruit selling area. 

René is asking for a second loan of 8000 HNL with which he will buy more rambutan fruit to take advantage of the season and make money. His dream is to finish constructing his house, build his business and improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy rambutan fruit to resell.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.es:
El Señor Virgilio es de la Ciudad de Concepción tiene un taller de camiones desde hace 10 años, es un cliente excelente que gracias a la ayuda que le brinda la fundación paraguaya pudo ir creciendo en su negocio con la cual mantiene a su familia  
El Sr. Virgilio desea ir mejorando en su negocio y así ofrecer una vida digna a su familia y poder procurar un mejor futuro para ellos.
Solicita este crédito para la compra de herramientas para su taller y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo con su negocio y dar así a su familia lo que necesitan para tener una vida sin privaciones.
texts.en:
Virgilio’s from the city of Concepción.  He’s had a truck repair shop for the last 10 years.  He’s an excellent client because thanks to the help Fundación Paraguaya provides he’s been able to grow in his business that supports his family.

Virgilio hopes to improve his business to offer his family a proper life and to be able to secure a better future for them.

He requests this loan to buy tools for his workshop so that he can continue growing with his business and thus provide what his family needs to have a life that’s free from want.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Corazón De Jesus Group

texts.es: El grupo “CORAZON DE JESUS” está conformada por 09 socias puntuales en sus cuotas y quienes a la vez se siente muy contentas por encontrarse pasando el 08 ciclo. Susana tiene 31 años es soltera en el  grupo cumple la función de presidenta cargo que le encomendaron los socios del mencionado grupo. Susana  hace unos meses implemento una pequeña panadería en su vivienda con el capital que junto trabajando en su kiosco. El nuevo proyecto de Susana es implementar adecuadamente su panadería. Para poder elaborar todo tipo de panes queques y tortas. El préstamo lo invirtió en la compra de harina azúcar leche y accesorios de panadería. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo. Susana es la segunda persona del lado izquierdo viste chompa morado.Y de la misma manera se encuentra la foto de Bryan en la parte superior derecho que no pudo estar presente en la reunión por encontrarse laborando.
texts.en:
Corazón de Jesús Group is made up of nine members who are punctual with their payments and happy to be in their eighth loan cycle.

Susana, 31, is single.  She's the president of the group, a position the group members entrusted her with.

A few months ago Susana set up a small bakery in her home with capital she put together working in her kiosk.  Susana's new project is to suitably outfit her bakery so she can make all types of bread, cakes, and tortes.

She'll invest the loan in buying flour, sugar, milk, and baking accessories.

The group's grateful to the Kiva investors for the loan.  Susana's the second person on the left; she's wearing a purple sweater.

You can find a picture of Bryan in the upper right part of the picture. He could not be present at the meeting because he was working.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and milk

loans.name: Shalom: Dios Con Nosotros Group

texts.es: Olga de 52 años es integrante del grupo “Shalom: Dios Con Nosotros” la cual lo conforma 07 mujeres trabajadoras y solidarias. Olga es separada con 04 hijos 01 de ellos aún dependiente. Hace varios años que Olga se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir para niños y adultos. Este negocio surgió gracias a la motivación de sus hijos y a los deseos de contar con un negocio propio. Se siente feliz pues ha logrado mejorar con la calidad de vida de su familia. A  pesar de la competencia Olga ha llegado a fidelizar a sus clientes. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de casacas y chompas. Su mayor deseo es de comprar su propia casa ya que por el momento vive en casa alquilada. El grupo agradecen por colaborar con su progreso. Olga se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado derecho y viste polo rojo y chaleco negro.
texts.en: Olga, 52 years old, is a member of the "Shalom: Dios Con Nosotros" ("Shalom: God With Us") group, which is composed of 7 hard-working and united women. Olga is separated with 4 children, 1 of them still dependent. For several years, Olga has sold clothing for children and adults. This business started thanks to the motivation of her children and the desire to have her own business. She is happy because she has succeeded in improving her family's quality of life. Despite the competition, Olga has fostered loyalty among her customers. She will use the loan she requested to buy coats and sweaters. Her greatest desire is to buy her own house, since at the moment she lives in a rented house. The group is thankful for the collaboration with their progress. Olga is seated; she is the first one on the right side and is wearing a red polo shirt and black vest.

loans.use: to buy coats and sweaters

loans.name: Verónica Monserrate

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, conocida como la Ciudad de Los Reales Tamarindos desde épocas coloniales se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Mi Mundo Natura.

En este lugar vive la señora Verónica, tiene 34 años de edad, es madre solera de un hijo de 10 años que estudia en escuela. Lleva tres ciclos en el  Banco comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son más bajos que en otras instituciones de crédito.
 
Doña Verónica para darle lo necesario a su hijo se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y también prepara y vende bocaditos, a ella le encanta cocinar y es por eso que decidió poner en práctica lo que le gusta y prepara estos bocaditos los mismos que son deliciosos y hace bajo pedido, los mismos que tres veces a la semana entrega en grandes cantidades. En cuanto a la venta de ropa ella sale a recorrer ya que su forma de  ventas es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa. Ella espera muy pronto y con la ayuda de los créditos poder instalar un local en su casa para así vender su mercadería y sus bocaditos, ya que son 8 años en estos negocios y ya requiere de un local.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar ropa y víveres para preparar los bocaditos. 

Su sueño es tener su local.
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, known as the “City of the Royal Tamarind Trees” since colonial times, the Communal Bank “Mi Mundo Natural” (My Natural World) meets every 15 days.

Sra. Verónica lives in this place.  She is 34 years old and a single mother of a 10-year-old son who is in school.  Verónica has been with her Communal Bank for three loan cycles and enjoys being a member because the interest rates are much lower than other credit institutions.

Doña Verónica provides what her son needs by selling clothing of all types.  She also prepares and sells snacks since she enjoys cooking.  For this reason, she puts into practice the activity that she enjoys.  She prepares delicious snacks to order three times a week and in large quantities.  With her clothing business, she goes door-to-door to conduct sales but she also sells out of her home.  With the help of the loans, she hopes to establish a shop in her house very soon where she can sell her merchandise and snacks.  Verónica has been in these businesses for eight years, which is why she needs a shop.  

This loan will be used to buy clothing and ingredients for preparing snacks.  Her dream is to have a shop.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell and ingredients for preparing snacks.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: pay for manual labor

loans.name: Sababsongo 2 Group

texts.fr:
Mme WOUGO MARGUERITE représente le groupe SABABSONGO 2. Elle se porte bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 09enfants. Le plus âgé a27ans et le moins âgé a 1an04mois. 06 vont à l’école. Elle a 06personnes en charge.
Mme vend des tubercules et fruits depuis 11ans. Elle s’approvisionne en Côte d’Ivoire et au Ghana. Ses clients sont les hommes, les femmes.
Elle veut s’acheter 03sacs d’ignames et 02sacs de patate douce.
Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne agrandir son activité et aider son mari dans les charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Wougo Marguerite represents the Sababsongo 2 group. She is doing well. She is married and the mother of 9 children. Wougo Marguerite's oldest child is 27 years old and her youngest is 1 year 4 months. 6 of her children attend school; she has a total of 6 people in her care.

Wougo Marguerite has been selling fruits and tubers for the last 11 years. She acquires her inventory in the Côte d’Ivoire and in Ghana. Her customers are both men and women. She wants to purchase 3 bags of yams and 2 bags of sweet potatoes. She wants to be able to put her profit in savings. Her hope is to grow her business and to help her husband with the household expenses.

loans.use: purchase 3 bags of yams and 2 bags of sweet potatoes

loans.name: Elsi Esperanza

texts.es:
Doña Elsi curso hasta el sexto grado de primaria quien junto a su conyugue se dedican a la agricultura, procrearon 2 hijos de los cuales uno tiene 12 años y está cursando el sexto grado de la primaria y el menor tiene 3 meses de edad, con ellos vive un trabajador el cual ayuda en las diferentes actividades del campo ya que él es originario de otra comunidad la cual está lejos de donde ellos viven actualmente. Doña Elsi junto a su conyugue se dedican al cultivo de café y granos básicos (maíz y frijoles) aunque en baja escala ya que solo producen para el consumo de su hogar. Los clientes son intermediarios que se dedican a comprar café en la misma comunidad y sus cultivos están aproximadamente a tres minutos de su casa de habitación y se trasladan en vehículo ya que tienen esa facilidad.

Ella ha solicitado un financiamiento el cual utilizara para la compra de abono, deshierba, la siembra de 4000 plantas de café y pago de mano de obra ya que esa es la mayor necesidad que tiene para que sus cultivos generen una excelente producción ya que con las ganancias ella las utilizara para mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia y hogar, con el tiempo comprar más tierra para cultivar y poder graduar a sus dos hijos de la universidad ya que esa es su mayor prioridad y sueño.
texts.en:
Elsi studied up to sixth grade of primary school. She and her husband work in agriculture and have 2 sons, one of whom is 12 years old and is in 6th grade of primary school while the other is 3 months old. They have a worker who lives with them, who helps in the various farming tasks and comes from another community which is a long way from where they currently live.

Elsi and her husband grow coffee, and basic grains (corn and beans) although on a small scale as they only produce these for their own consumption. Their customers are middlemen who buy coffee in their community. Their fields are approximately 3 minutes away from their home and they get there by vehicle since they have one available. 

Elsi has asked for a loan which she will use to buy fertilizer, for weed removal and for planting 4000 coffee plants and to pay for labour. This is the greatest need she has so that she can get a good yield from her crops. With the profits she will be able to improve the standard of living for her home and family. With time she hopes to buy more land to cultivate and be able to help her 2 sons to graduate from university since this is her main priority and dream.

loans.use: to buy new plants and agricultural supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice for resale.

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado 8 de diciembre está en el ciclo número  9 del programa de comité, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder conocer la situación en que cada una de las integrantes esta. Esta encuesta mostro que 3 de las integrantes están en un nivel bajo de ingresos.
Una integrante de este grupo es la Sra. Angelica, quien se dedica a la venta de bebidas de todo tipo. Comenta que con mucho esfuerzo pudo montar su negocio y así ir tratando de mejorar sus ingresos  y ayudar a su familia. Es una persona muy sacrificada que quiere salir adelante e ir mejorando su vida y la de su familia.
Ella solicita de este crédito para podre invertirlo en la compra de cervezas, gaseosas, vinos, y demás tipos de bebidas, para poder seguir con sus ventas, ya que quiere estar bien surtida y seguir dando a sus clientes lo que piden.
texts.en: The "8 de diciembre" (December 8th) is on its 9th cycle with the communal bank program. They are doing the poverty elimination survey to be able to understand the situation of each member. This survey showed that three of the members have a low income level. One member of the group is Angelica, who works selling all kinds of drinks. She says that with a lot of effort, she was able to set up her business and that way try to improve her income and help her family. She is a very selfless person who wants to move forward and improve her and her family's life. She is applying for this loan to purchase beer, soft drinks, wines, and other kinds of drinks, in order to continue with her sales, since she wants to be well-stocked and continue giving her customers what they ask for.

loans.use: to buy beers, soft drinks, wine, and other kinds of drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of food items, such as fish, eggs and onions, thus helping her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Marcelo De Jesús

texts.es: Marcelo es padre de 3 hijos y vive en unión libre con su pareja. Desde que era un niño, comenzó a conocer las actividades del campo, pues nació y creció allí, sus padres le enseñaron gran parte de lo que hoy sabe y, gracias a ello, ha podido aplicar esos conocimientos para generar ingresos que le permitan sostener a su familia; pues se dedica a trabajar como jornalero en diferentes fincas de la región y adicionalmente, posee cultivos de diferentes productos, cuyas cosechas son recolectadas para ser vendidas en las diferentes plazas de la región. El cliente es un señor pujante, activo, trabajador y dedicado a su familia, quien es la principal motivación para seguir avanzando y sobrepasar todas las adversidades que se le presentan, ya sea con sus cultivos o a nivel personal, sin embargo, siempre encuentra las herramientas para seguir avanzando. Actualmente solicita el crédito, que será invertido en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes, entre otros) con el fin de darle continuidad a su labor, cuidar y preparar los cultivos para que las próximas cosechas sean más productivas y le permitan incrementar el margen de utilidades que recibe por la venta de los alimentos. De esta forma, Marelo sueña con mantener sus cultivos, ampliarlos y hacerlos sostenibles, para que le permitan disfrutar de una estabilidad económica y un mejor bienestar al lado de las personas que ama.
texts.en: Marcelo is the father of three children and lives in free union with his partner. Since he was a child, he began to learn the work of the countryside, since he was born and grew up there. His parents taught him a great part of what he knows today, and thanks to that, he has been able to apply that knowledge to generate income that allows him to support his family. Thus he works as a day laborer on various farms in the region, and in addition, he has fields with different products, whose harvests are collected to be sold in the various markets of the region. This borrower is a vigorous, active, and hard-working man, dedicated to his family, who are his principal motivation to continue advancing and overcome all the adversities that are presented to him, whether with his crops or at a personal level. Nevertheless, he always finds the tools to continue advancing. Now he is applying for a loan, which will be invested in the purchase of agricultural supplies (compost, pesticides, and fertilizers, among other items), with the goal of giving continuity to his work, caring for and preparing his crops so that the next harvests will be more productive and will allow him to increase the profit margin that he receives from the sale of his foods. In this way, Marcelo dreams of maintaining his crops, expanding them, and making them sustainable, so that they allow him to enjoy a stable economy and a greater well-being at the side of the people he loves.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies (compost, pesticides, and fertilizers, among other items)

loans.name: Virgen Poderosa Group

texts.es:
El grupo Virgen Poderosa  está en su ciclo número 5º  del programa de comité, donde todas trabajan  y se ayudan por salir adelante se dedican a sus respectivas actividades. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 6  se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con deficiencias en ciertas áreas que deben mejorar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Flora, quien se dedica a la venta de comestibles, que ella misma hace y en lo cual le va muy bien, ya que sus comidas son muy ricas y lo piden mucho sus clientes. Es una mujer muy trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo esta saliendo adelante. Hoy solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de carne, condimentos, verduras y demás insumos para poder seguir con la elaboración  de las comidas que vende.
texts.en:
The Virgen Poderosa group is in its fifth cycle of the committee program, in which all the members work and help one another to move forwards. They make a living in various activities. They are participating in the poverty elimination survey, and it turns out that six of them are living under the poverty line, which means that they lack basic resources in certain areas, which needs to be improved.

One of the members is Flora, who makes a living selling homemade food. The business is doing very well, because her food is delicious and is in high demand by her customers. She is a very hardworking woman who, with a great deal of effort, is moving forwards. Today, she is requesting a loan to invest in buying meat, condiments, vegetables and other ingredients to continue making the food she sells.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, vegetables, and other ingredients

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es casada, tiene cuatro hijos, vive en casa de sus familiares en la ciudad de El Alto.
Ella estudio solo hasta el nivel secundario. Se dedida a la comercializacion de pescado  de martes a viernes Su esposo es albañil y gana muy poco
Necesita crédito para incrementar su capital de trabajo, lo que le permitirá comprar más pescado y así acudir a diferentes ferias alteñas con su producto en mayor cantidad para obtener más ventas 
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Juana is married, has four children, and lives in her family's home in the city of El Alto.  She only went to school up to high school.  She works as a fish seller from Tuesday to Friday.  Her husband is a mason and earns very little.  

She needs a loan to increase her working capital so she can buy more fish and attend different fairs in El Alto with her fish. With her larger amount of fish, she can obtain more sales. This is the first time she is requesting a loan from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy more fish for her business

loans.name: Ximena

texts.es:
Ximena es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos, vive en casa de familiares ubicada en la ciudad de El Alto.
Ella estudio solo hasta el nivel secundario. Se dedida a la comercializacion de productos de aseo personal (cosmeticos) de  martes a viernes en ferias de El Alto.
Necesita credito para comprar mayor y variada mercaderia en cuanto a perfumes se refiere.
El sueño de Ximena  es ser distribuidora nacional de una gran variedad de cosméticos 
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a  KIVA.
texts.en:
Ximena is a single mother with two children. She lives in a family member's home in the city of El Alto. Ximena only studies up to secondary school and makes a living selling personal hygiene products and cosmetics Tuesday-Friday in the El Alto markets. 

She needs this loan to buy varied wholesale products, especially perfumes. Ximena's dream is to become a national distributor of a wide variety of cosmetics. This is her first loan that she will be taking out through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics for her business

loans.name: Zenon

texts.es:
Zenon es casado, su esposa vive en el campo, tiene un  hijo que le ayuda, viven en casa de familiares ubicada la ciudad de El Alto.
El estudio solo hasta el nivel de primaria. Su oficio es ser hojalatero (recicla desechos metalicos como turriles) y construye objetos metalicos para usar en el hogar 
Necesita credito para comprar más turriles que le permitan fabricar objetos de uso personal como bañadores, en mayor cantidad.
El sueño de Zenon es que sus  productos se comercialicen a nivel departamental.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Zenon is married; his wife lives in the country; he has a son who helps him; they live at a relative's house in the city of El Alto.

He only has a primary education.  He is a professional tinsmith (he recycles scrap metal like barrels) and he builds metal objects to be used in the home. 

He needs this loan to buy more metal containers that allow him to make objects for personal use, such as bathtubs, in greater quantities

Zenon's dream is for his products to be sold at the department level. 

This is his first time applying for a Kiva loan.

loans.use: Capital de trabajo para comprar materia prima para su negocio de hojalatería

loans.name: Merlie

texts.en:
Merlie is 49 years old and married with nine children, four of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Merlie has a piña weaving business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy materials needed for her piña weaving.

Merlie has been in this business for 13 years. In the future, Merlie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her piña weaving.

loans.name: Crispina

texts.en:
Crispina is 37 years old and has six children. She is married and four of her children are in school.

Crispina is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. She has requested a loan of PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Crispina has been in pig fattening for 3 years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Crispina would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Aracelis Cecilia

texts.es:
La Señorita. Aracelis se encuentra realizando su segundo crédito a lado de sus amigas y compañeras del grupo de crédito Las Triunfadoras, le gusta esta forma de crédito ya que todas sus compañeras le ayudan con su apoyo moral a salir en adelante. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que se resplandece por la belleza arquitectónica, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, se encuentra  bañada por 4 ríos, goza de una gran variedad en su gastronomía.

La Señorita. Aracelis tiene 24 años de edad Y es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres y comparten los gastos del hogar. 

Doña Aracelis tiene un bazar y bisutería desde hace 4 años, trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo, este trabajo le gusta mucho porque le da independencia económica y es su propio jefe.

El dinero de su crédito va a ser invertido en la compra de bisutería para crecer en su negocio. 

Su meta es ser una profesional en el área de contabilidad.
texts.en:
Aracelis is doing her second loan together with her friends and fellow members of the loan group Las Triunfadoras. She likes this type of loan, as all the other women in the group give her moral support to help her get ahead. She lives in the city of Cuenca, which shines with architectural beauty and has been a UNESCO World Heritage Site since December 1999. It is bathed by four rivers and enjoys great variety in its gastronomy.

Aracelis is 24 years old and single. She lives in her parents' house and they share the household expenses.

Aracelis has had a variety and accessories store for four years now. She works from Sunday to Sunday, without a fixed schedule. She likes her job very much because it gives her financial independence and because she is her own boss.

The money from the loan will be invested in buying accessories to grow her business.

Her goal is to be an accounting professional.

loans.use: to buy accessories

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
Natalia es una joven de 24 años de edad madre de 3 hijos agricultora y ama de casa una madre de familia con ganas de superarse y de salir adelante. En compañía de su compañero de hogar se dedican al cultivo y siembra de café y hortalizas las cuales venden en la misma zona, con los vecinos, amigos y personas que llegan a la zona en busca de un producto con calidad para re vender. Natalia tiene 3 años de educación primaria cursados ya que por falta de apoyo financiero por parte de sus padres no pudo continuar, posteriormente se acompañó del que hoy en día es su pareja. Ella aprendió de sus padres el trabajo de la tierra ya que ellos son agricultores por tradición siendo esta la única actividad como medio de ingresos para su familia. Uno de sus mayores desafíos es poder aumentar sus cultivos para lograr mayores ganancias para el beneficio de su familia ya que su mayor deseo y anhelo es lograr que sus hijos puedan estudiar a nivel superior, convirtiéndose en personas con conocimiento, abriendo puertas y enfrentando los problemas económicos de manera positiva.

Es por ello que duramente en compañía de su pareja trabajan diariamente para poder cumplir sus metas y sus propósitos siendo hoy en día una de ellas el financiamiento que ha solicitado a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de 8 QQ de fórmula 12-24-12, 10 QQ de fórmula 18-46-00, 10 kilos de evicet, 10 kilos de nutrí café y otra parte para será destinada para preparar la tierra y cultivar nueva semilla.
texts.en:
Natalia is a young woman of 24 years, the mother of 3 children, a farmer and homemaker, a working mother with a desire to improve and get ahead. She and her live-in partner make their living planting and growing coffee and vegetables, which they sell in the area to neighbors, friends, and people who go to the area looking for a quality product to resell. Natalia has 3 years of primary education; since she lacked financial support from her parents, she was unable to continue. Later on she met the man who is now her partner. 
She learned how to work the land from her parents; they are farmers by tradition, this being the only means of income for their family. One of her biggest challenges is to be able to increase her crops to make more profits to benefit her family, since her greatest wish and desire is to make it possible for her children to study at the level of higher education and become knowledgeable people, opening doors and facing economic problems in a positive way.
It is because of this that she and her partner work hard every day to accomplish their goals and objectives. One of these objectives is the loan that she has requested from the COMIXMUL cooperative to buy 800 lbs of 12-24-12 fertilizer, 1000 lbs of 18-46-00 fertilizer, 10 kg of evicet, and 10 kg of nutrí café. She will use the rest of the loan to prepare the land and sow new seeds.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to tend her coffee crops.

loans.name: Armine

texts.en:
Armine is a 36-year-old married woman who lives in Vanadzor city with her two school-aged children. Her husband is working abroad in the Russian Federation. Armine works as a hairdresser in a small beauty salon which she rents. Her salon provides hairdressing services for both women and men. She has been working in this profession for five years and has become a very skilled hairdresser. Her salon gets many visitors since she works quickly, cheaply and effectively.
Armine has requested a loan of 300,00 Armenian drams as she wants to buy a special machine for hair washing and also some furniture for her salon as she wants to renew the interior.

loans.use: to buy a special machine for hair washing and some furniture for her salon as she wants to renew the interior

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
38-year-old Janet is from Liberia. She lives in Logan Town, one of the early communities in Liberia that is well-known.  She is married, and her husband is a driver. They both have five children between the ages of 19 and 10.  Only three are presently in school, and live at home. She stopped her education at grade 11. 

For the past five years, she has been running a shop where she sells soap, toothpaste, milk, etc.  She started this business by selling on a market table, and later received money from her husband to increase her inventory. She learned this way of selling from her friends.  She is very happy with her business because she makes more profit every day, and it keeps her busy.  Most interestingly, she has learned the different kinds of local languages. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more soap, toothpaste, milk, etc. for her business.  Her plan is to educate her children. She appreciates BRAC Liberia and the lenders who support them.

loans.use: to purchase more soap, toothpaste, milk, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  Mujeres Emprendedoras está en su ciclo número dos del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas y cada una de ellas está trabajando arduamente, ya que quieren ir creciendo y mejorando sus vidas.
Una mujer muy trabajadora es Maria, quien tiene una despensa bien surtida, en la cual trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas. Comenta que con mucho esfuerzo ha ido montando y equipando su despensa, y hoy ya tiene un buen negocio. Es una persona que tiene muchas ganas de seguir creciendo y mejorando.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su despensa, ya que quiere seguir ofreciendo una buena calidad de productos a sus clientes. Ella quiere poder comprar comestibles, bebidas, gaseosas, verduras y demás.
texts.en:
The "Mujeres Emprendedoras" group is in their second cycle with the Woman's Committee program, in which each and every one of the women are working hard as they want to grow and improve their lives. Maria is one of these hard-working women. She has a well-stocked store where she works every day from a very early hour. She comments that with a lot of effort she has built and equipped her store so that today it is a good business. She is a person who has a lot of desire to continue growing and improving.

Maria is requesting this loan to invest it in buying supplies for her store, as she wants to offer a good variety of products to her customers. She wants to buy food products, drinks, soft-drinks, vegetables, etc.

loans.use: to buy food products, drinks, soft-drinks, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 64 years old and married with five children.

Editha works hard to provide for her family and runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock, such as snack foods, soft-drinks, biscuits, laundry soap, etc., to sell in her general store.

Editha has borrowed and repaid 15 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns additional income from food vending.

Editha aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock for her general store.  Items she sells include snack foods, soft-drinks, biscuits, laundry soap, etc.

loans.name: Edson

texts.en:
Edson is single and lives at his own house where he does not have electricity but does have piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past one and a half years, he has operated a motorcycle business. He faces the major challenges of motorcycle breakdowns and muddy roads during the rainy season. He dreams of buying a new motorcycle and developing himself.

With the loan of 50,0000 KES, he wants to purchase spare parts for his motorbike. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his motorbike

loans.name: Erna

texts.en:
Erna is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 45 years old and four of her children are in school.

Erna has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy additional food products to sell. She has been in this business for 10 years. 

In the future, Erna would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional food products to sell.

loans.name: Gazmir

texts.en:
Gazmir is a 28-year-old single man from southeastern Albania. He holds an undergraduate degree, yet he has decided to run his own activity in agriculture

During his interview, Gazmir says, “Even though I went to university, I knew what I wanted to do besides education. Being raised in a village, I had enjoyed all the goods up to that moment, so continuing on the same route as my parents and like so many other people with a farming upbringing, would be a joy for me; and so far, no regrets. For four years now, I have been selling raw milk and other agricultural produce and I plan on continuing the same activity.”

Gazmir wants to stock up on animals’ fodder for the winter with the loan he is requesting.

loans.use: to stock up on animals' fodder for the winter season.

loans.name: Estilita

texts.en:
Estilita is 62 years old and married with 12 children. She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines.

Estilita is borrowing 16,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy additional livestock and vitamins for her business. She has been raising livestock for 5 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling vegetables.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock and vitamins for her business.

loans.name: Demitilah

texts.en:
Demitilah is a mother of three children who go to school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Demitilah prepares various foods, such as flat bread, beans, and rice, and sells them to her customers. She owns a kiosk that sells various items such as cigarettes and groundnuts, which she sells from her home to her neighbors and passersby. 

With the loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings (KES), she wants to purchase wheat flour, rice, cooking oil, and packets of cigarettes. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, rice, cooking oil, and packets of cigarettes.

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Comfort is 35 years old and lives in Logan Town, Liberia. From 2001 she has been running a cook shop (restaurant) in her community, where she sells delicious Liberian dishes. She started this business with the small amount that she earned when she worked as a care taker, after she dropped out of 6th grade.
