Elerti is being photographed in-front of his animal stable. He is a 24-year-old, recently married village guy with a one-year-old child. 

“When I turned 18, I went to Greece for work and I did work for two years, thanks to the Greeks who gave me the opportunity. With the money I made there, I came back to my village and purchased two dairy cows. So, since my return, I have been taking care of our animals and selling their raw milk to the dairy farm in our village,” said Elerti.

The soil in his village, and generally in the entire region, grows good potatoes, and many residents take advantage of this. Now Elerti also wants to buy potato seeds/seedlings to plant, and this is the reason for this loan.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds for planting.

loans.name: Maria Auristela

texts.es:
Doña María es una señora de 54 años de edad curso hasta el primer año de la primaria y es madre de 8 hijos de los cuales 7 ya son adultos, en hogares a parte y solo uno vive con ellos el cual tiene 21 años de edad curso el segundo año de carrera que no termino por decisión propia ya que decidió apoyar a su padre en los quehaceres del campo. Ellos en familia se desempeñan en la siembra, cultivo de café y granos básicos en pequeña producción el cual le sirve de sustento a su familia y en ocasiones vende parte de su producción. Doña María se ha dedicado a este rubro desde hace más de 40 años ya que este tipo de actividad viene de generaciones, el grano de café lo vende en oro y lo hacen por medio de intermediarios ya que así se evitan hacer el gasto de trasladarlo a las bodegas en donde es almacenado y vendido el producto. Sus cultivos una parte están ubicadas aproximadamente a 5 minutos y la otra parte a 15 minutos en carro.

Su mayor meta es que sus hijos obtengan un mejor patrimonio dejando un techo digno y tierras para que las puedan trabajar. Su sueño es que su hijo menor se gradúe de la universidad y considera que con el apoyo que hoy en día solicita a la cooperativa COMIXMUL solicitando un financiamiento podrá lograr este proyecto ya que su necesidad en este momento es poder darle asistencia a sus cultivos de café comprando 8 QQ de urea, 8 QQ de fórmula 12-24-12 y 8 QQ de fórmula 18-26-0.
texts.en:
María is a 54 year old woman. She is the mother of eight children. Seven of them are adults and live in their own homes. Only one, a 21 year old, lives at home with them. He decided to stop school in the second year of university and  help his father with the work in the fields. As a family they plant and grow coffee and other basic grains on a small scale, which serves to sustain the family and occasionally they sell part of their product. 

María has worked in this field for more than 40 years now. It is a tradition that goes back generations in her family. She sells the coffee beans "en oro" (separated from the outer skin or fruit and polished) through intermediaries so they avoid paying the shipping cost to the warehouse. It is stored and sold there. Her fields are about five minutes away by car and another part 15 minutes away. Her goal is for her children to receive a better inheritance, leaving a solid house and land they can work. 

María's dream is for her youngest son to finish university. She considers that the assistance she is requesting from COMIXMUL will help her achieve this project. What she needs right now is to help her coffee crops buying 8 quintals of urea, 8 quintals of Formula 12-24-12 and 8 quintals of Formula 18-26-0.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to maintain her coffee crops.

loans.name: Las Semillitas Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Las Semillitas”  está conformada por 06 socios,  que se encuentra pasando el 14 ciclo, dicho grupo en el transcurso del tiempo han demostrado ser personas trabajadores y responsables. Maruja una de las socias se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves  como gallinas, patos, pollos y  pavos. Esto surgió con los deseos de contar con un negocio propio. Pues gracias a su perseverancia ha mejorado su vivienda. El deseo de Maruja es de mejorar su negocio comprando más aves. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará  para la compra de alimentos balanceados para sus animales. Maruja de 50 años es separada con 03 hijos independientes. El grupo “Las Semillitas” agradecen el crédito brindado. Maruja se encuentra sentada viste casaca marón.
texts.en:
The Las Semillitas (Little Seeds) communal bank is composed of 6 members and is completing its 14th cycle. Over time, the members of this group have demonstrated themselves to be hard-working and responsible people. 

Maruja, one of the members, raises and sells poultry such as hens, ducks, chickens, and turkeys. This began with her desire to have her own business. Thanks to her perseverance, she has improved her home. Maruja wants to improve her business by purchasing more birds. This loan will be used to purchase feed for her animals. Maruja, 50 years old, is separated with 3 adult children. 

The Las Semillitas group appreciates the loans provided. Maruja is seated, dressed in a brown jacket.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed

loans.name: Suleiman

texts.en:
Suleiman is a hardworking man who lives in his own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. He operates a motorcycle business that has been in operation for the past three years.

His major challenge is motorcycle breakdown and the need to buy spare parts. He will use the requested KES 40,000 loan to purchase spare parts and service the motorcycle.

Suleiman joined Yehu and Kiva to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and service the motorcycle.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José, tienen 55 años de edad, esta casado, tiene cuatro hijos y vive en el municipio de La Masica, Atlántida.  Hace 10 años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de jugos de caña.  Este producto lo elabora y lo vende en bolsa en el mercado. Ha solicitado otro  préstamo por 17000 Lempiras siendo este el tercer ciclo en ODEF, el cual lo va invertir en el mantenimiento del molino de moler caña y compra de caña, bolsa, pajillas para vender el jugo. Este préstamo le ayudara a aumentar el negocio y a obtener mejores ganancias. Su meta es crecer con el negocio para el bienestar personal y de la familia.
texts.en: José is 55 years old, married, has four children and lives in the municipality of La Masica, Atlántida. For the past ten years he has worked making and selling sugar cane juice. He produces the product and sells it by the bag in the market. He has requested another loan of 17,000 HNL. This is his third cycle with ODEF. He will invest it in the maintenance of his sugar cane mill and buy sugar cane, bags and straws to sell the juice. This loan will allow him to expand his business and create greater revenues. His goal is to make his business bigger for the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to invest in the maintenance of his sugar cane mill, buy sugar cane, bags and straws to sell the juice.

loans.name: Percy Washintong

texts.es:
Percy vive en la ciudad de Carhuaz, es un hombre muy trabajador, sobre todo porque vive al lado de sus 2 hijos de 12 y 7 años a quienes saca adelante con los ingresos de su humilde negocio de venta de joyas, el trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día, Percy cree que está saliendo adelante con su negocio porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque desea superarse.

Percy esta my agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar más joyas y así poder tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer, y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Percy lives in the city of Carhuaz. He is a hard-working man, chiefly because he lives alongside his two children, ages 12 and 7, whom he supports with the income from his small jewel-selling business. He works around 9 hours per day. Percy feels that his business is moving forward because he is very responsible and, above all, because he wants to get ahead in life. 

Percy is very grateful to Kiva's small lenders as thanks to the help they have provided, he will be able to purchase more gems and thus have a greater variety of products to offer. He will continue to fight to realize his greatest dream: to provide his children with a profession.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (gems)

loans.name: Ivette Del Carmen

texts.es: Ivette es originaria de la ciudad de Granada. Tiene 26 años de edad,casada. Es de oficio comerciante y se dedica a la venta de calzado  desde hace 6 años. Considera que su negocio es rentable, ya que le ayudo a crecer económicamente. Solicita el  crédito para comprar: sandalias, deportivos, zapatos de niños, chinelas, entre otros con el fin de diversificar su negocio, aumentar sus ventas y obtener mayores ingresos. Estima que el financiamiento será  gran oportunidad, ya que podrá comprar los productos que necesita para satisfacer a sus clientes. Su plan futuro es ampliar su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ivette is a native of the city of Granada. She is 26 years old and married. She is a merchant and has been selling shoes for the past 6 years. She considers her business profitable, as it helps her to grow economically. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase sandals, sneakers, children's shoes, slippers, and other products with the aim of diversifying her business, increasing her sales, and obtaining a higher income. She sees this financing as a great opportunity, as she will be able to purchase the products she needs to satisfy her customers. Her future plan is to expand her business and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase sandals, sneakers, children's shoes, slippers, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: finish building an enclosing wall on the back of his home.

loans.name: Konah

texts.en:
Konah is 40 year old and Lives in Logan Town. She is married, and her husband is a businessman. They have four children between the ages of 3 and 20, two of whom attend school.

Konah has been operating a shop selling charcoal for the past five years. She says sometimes she experiences losses, but not all of the time.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal for her business. She hopes to extend her business in other local markets and send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Mirjana

texts.en:
Mirjana wants to buy potato seeds for planting. What you see in the background of the photograph is her house, the stable and the hay barn. She is 37, and has three young-aged children. 

Mirjana has been in the livestock type of activity for the past ten years and has been selling raw milk to a nearby dairy farm. 

Here is what she said to the officer who interviewed her: “Our village is struck by extreme cold and snowy winters. So, we have to make sure that our animals stay warm and inside in their stables throughout the cold weather. As soon as we see some sun rays coming down, we take the animals out of their stable so that they breathe some fresh air. We must take great care of our animals, because we secure our staple food for our children, but this wouldn’t be enough if we didn’t sell some agricultural products, such as grain, red onions and potatoes.”

loans.use: to buy potato seeds for planting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies for her vegetable garden

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: expand his business and purchase merchandise

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa,  Victor se dedica a la agricultura, oficio con el cual ha podido sacar adelante a sus 2 hijos, quienes ya son mayores. Victor le gusta mucho lo que hace, actualmente ha sembrado maíz, por ello cada día le dedica a su cultivo alrededor de 9 horas al día; Victor cree que esta le va bien en su cultivo porque es responsable y sobre todo cuidadoso.

Victor está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar fertilizantes, abono, solventar los gastos de regadío, entre otros, con lo cual podrá mejorar su cultivo y poder tener una buena cosecha, así mejorara sus ingresos y seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una movilidad para transportar su cultivo”.
texts.en:
Victor lives in the city of Pucallpa. He is engaged in agriculture, an occupation through which he has been able to support his 2 children, who are now grown. Victor loves what he does. Currently he has planted corn, and each day he dedicates himself to cultivation for around 9 hours. Victor believes that his crops are coming along well because he is responsible and, above all, careful. 

Victor is grateful to Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they have provided he will be able to purchase fertilizer and manure and pay for irrigation, among other things, with which he can improve his crops and ensure a good harvest. This way, he will improve his income and continue fighting to realize his greatest dream: buying a vehicle to transport his harvest.

loans.use: to purchase manure, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Maria Modesta

texts.es: Maria Modesta tiene 31 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en una aldea rural del Municipio de Lepaera, Departamento de Lempira. Ella tenia un negocio de pulperia anteriormente, pero siempre se a dedicado a la agricultura. actualmente solo atiende el cultivo de café junto con su esposo. la producción que obtiene la vende a intermediarios de la zona. Esta solicitando un cuarto ciclo de préstamo que es por 18,000 lempiras, el cual piensa invertir en compra de fertilizantes para mejorar la finca y la cosecha, también para preparar una manzana de terreno y sembrar café. Su plan es buscar obtener mejores ganancias para mejorar la calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Maria Modesta is 31 years old and married, and she and her husband have two children. They live in a rural village near Lepaera, depatment of Lempira. She used to run a small corner store, but has always been involved in agriculture. Currently, she just sees to growing coffee alongside her husband. She sells her harvest to the middlemen in the area. She is requesting a fourth term on her loan for 18,000 lempiras, which she plans to invest in the purchase of fertilizers to improve her farm and her harvest. She will also prepare an acre of land to plant coffee. Her plan is to try and earn greater income so that she can improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer and prepare land for growing coffee.

loans.name: Juana Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Juana es originaria de la ciudad de Granada. Tiene 61 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos. Es de oficio comerciante y se dedica a brindar el servicio de alquiler de bicicletas desde hace 9 años, antes de iniciar con esta actividad, trabajo en otras empresas de las cuales recibe una pensión. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Bicicletas y darles mantenimiento a las que están en uso. Estima que el crédito será de mucha ayuda para incrementar sus ingresos, ya que podrá invertir en su negocio y mejorar las condiciones de sus activos fijos. Su meta futuro es ampliar el área donde están sus bicicletas.
texts.en:
Juana is originally from Grenada. She is 61 years old, married and the mother of two children. She is a businesswoman and for the past nine years has operated a bicycle rental service. Before this she worked for other companies and receives a pension from this. She can also count on the support of her husband. 

Juana is asking for this loan to buy bicycles and to maintain the bikes she already has. She believes the loan will help a lot to increase her revenues as she can invest in her business and upgrade the condition of her fixed assets. Her future goal is to increase the size of the area where she keeps the bikes.

loans.use: to buy bicycles and upkeep the ones in use.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
El señor Eduardo tiene 22 años de edad esta casado con la señora Adelina con quien tiene dos hijas de pequeña edad. 
Está solicitando un préstamo para terminar la construcción de un cuarto que esta haciendo en el patio trasero de su vivienda. Ya que sus hijas necesitan su propia recamara.
El señor Eduardo es empleado de una fábrica en el aria de producción y su esposa la señora Adelina trabaja para una fábrica donde elaboran los asientos para los carros en el aria de costura, son las fuente de ingresos que tiene para salir adelante que su familia tenga lo necesario.
Con el sueldo que recibe el señor Eduardo es para pagar el crédito, y el ingreso que obtiene la señora Adelina es para los gastos familiares.
Desean mejorar la calidad de vida y que sus hijas tengan el espacio en su casa.
texts.en:
Eduardo is 22 years old and is married to Adelina, with whom he has two young daughters.

He is asking for a loan so he can finish construction on a room that he is having built in the back of his house.  His daughters are in need of their own bedroom.

Eduardo works in a manufacturing plant and his wife Adelina works in sewing at a factory where car seats are made.  These are the sources of income  he has to help his family get ahead and have all of their needs fulfilled.

Eduardo will pay back his loan with what he makes from his work, whereas Adelina's income will go towards the household expenses.

They seek to improve their quality of life and allow their daughters to have the space that they need.

loans.use: finish construction on his daughters' bedroom.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
This is 40-year-old Nancy from Liberia. She lives in Logan Town, one of the early communities in Liberia that is well known. She is married and her husband is a driver. They have five children between the ages of 4 and 22, only three of whom are presently in school and live at home. She stopped education at sixth grade. 

For the past five years she has been running a cook shop (restaurant) where she sells rice and soup. She started this business by selling at a table market and later received money from her husband to change her business to a cook shop business. She learned this way of selling from her friends. She is very happy with her business because she makes more profit every day and most interestingly she meets new people every day. She is requesting a loan to purchase more meat, fish, pepper, oil, rice, etc. for her business. Her plan is to educate all her children. She appreciates BRAC Liberia and the lenders who support small business people.

loans.use: to purchase more meat, fish, pepper, oil, rice, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah is a 24-year-old married woman. She has two children, an 8-year-old and a 13-year-old. She operates a store where she sells cereals. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her business is located in a busy area, and her primary customers are local individuals, commercial and institutional customers. 

Fridah describes her biggest business challenge as lack of capital. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of cereals for resale. She hopes that in the future, she will expand the business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of cereals for resale

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Meet Fatmata, She is a 35-year-old from Waterloo, in the Eastern area of Freetown. She is married with three children between the ages of 3 years and 13 years. Two of her children are currently attending school. For the past seven years, Fatmata has established a business selling assorted drinks within the Waterloo community. She was a housewife. She began this business because she wanted to contribute to taking care of the children. She works at the business from 8:00 am until 7:00 pm, seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is during rainy season when sales are very slow.

Fatmata requires a loan in order to purchase more assorted drinks for resale. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to become more successful and repay her loan. In the future, Fatmata plans to expand and open another outlet. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more assorted drinks for resale.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 37 years old and married.   She has seven children, ranging from 2 years to 20 years. She describes herself to be reliable. 

She operates a cereals store where she sells beans, peas and maize. She has been involved in this business for four years. Her business is located in a profitable area, and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be a low supply of stock, hence higher prices and lower profits. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy maize and beans for sale. 

Her business goal is to become the leading cereals trader in her area within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be profitable and self-sustaining. 

This is her second loan with SMEP DTM.  Her previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy maize and beans for sale

loans.name: Saffiatu

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 47-year-old Saffiatu from Waterloo, in the Eastern area of Freetown. She is divorced with four children between the ages of 13 years and 27 years. Three of her children are attending school. She started this business because she needed to create a permanent source of income to support the home.  

Saffiatu runs a retail store. She sells toothpaste, soap, drinks and electronic devices. She has been running this business since 2007. She works at the business seven days, twelve hours per day.  Saffiatu says that the main challenge to her business is the fact that transporting her goods from the city to her business place is very difficult.

Saffiatu has requested a loan in order to purchase items including toothpaste, soap, drinks and electronic devices for resale. The extra income from this loan will allow her to buy a plot of land and renovate her house. In the future, she plans to build a permanent business location. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase food items including toothpaste, soap, drinks and electronic devices for resale

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
This is Annie from Liberia.  She is 35 years old and has six children, ages between 6 and 22.  They live in Logan Town Area, one of the early communities in Liberia and well-known. She is married to a man who works at Freeport. Their children are presently in school. 

Annie finished 12th grade before starting her business ten years ago. She runs a shop selling rice and soup. She started her business with money from her husband and then learned the business from her friends.  She likes her business because she realizes a small profit. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more rice, pepper, oil, vita, onions, etc., for her business.  Her plans are to build a house and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more rice, pepper, oil, vita, onions, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Meet Fatmata. She is a 49-year-old from Waterloo, an eastern area in Sierra Leone. She is married with four children. Two of her children are currently attending school. For the past 20 years, Fatmata has established a palm oil business in a particular market area. She began her business because she wanted to create a permanent source of income to support her children. She works at the business from 8:00 am until 7:00 pm, seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is the high cost of transportation.

Fatmata requires a loan in order to purchase more local food like gallons of palm oil. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to become more successful and pay her children's school fees. In the future, Fatmata plans to export her palm oil to a neighboring country. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more local food like gallons of palm oil.

loans.name: Heriberto Antonio

texts.es: Heriberto Antonio de cuarenta años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia. Es empleado, se dedica al aseo urbano, es un empleo humilde pero muy honrado, tiene muchos años en su labor. Heriberto es responsable y muy luchador siempre está buscando las mejores alternativas que le permitan darle una mejor vida a su familia; su vivienda está ubicada en una zona rural y necesita hacer algunas mejoras; poner balcones y ventanas,  cambiar la lamina del techo para que no se filtre el agua en esta época de lluvia y terminar de construir un cuarto, está muy entusiasmado con las modificaciones, pues sabe que es para mayor comodidad y seguridad de los miembros de su hogar, pero Heriberto no cuenta con capital que lo respalde por eso se decidió a solicitarle a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar ventanas, las defensas de ventanas, lamina, ladrillos, cemento, entre otros. Heriberto está muy contento con la ayuda y  asegura que junto con su esposa harán lo posible por saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido.
texts.en:
Heriberto Antonio, 40 years old, lives with his wife and their three children in a house that they own. He is employed and works in urban waste management. It is a humble but very honorable job. Heriberto Antonio has been working in this post for many years. He is a responsible and determined man who is always seeking alternative opportunities to help provide his family with a better life. 

Heriberto Antonio's house is located in a rural area and he needs to make some improvements to it. He plans to install balconies and windows, as well as change the metal panels on his roof so that water doesn't leak into the house during rainy season, and finish building a bedroom. Heriberto Antonio is very excited about these modifications because he knows that it will make his family safer and more comfortable. However, he does't presently have enough capital to purchase everything he needs to carry out the home improvements. For this reason, he decided to request a loan from FUSAI in order to buy windows, window guards, sheet metal, bricks, cement, and other supplies. 

Heriberto Antonio is very happy with this help and he assures lenders that he and his wife will do everything possible to get out of debt in the established time period.

loans.use: to buy windows, window guards, sheet metal, bricks, and cement.

loans.name: El Buen Samaritano Group

texts.es: Reyna es socia del grupo “El Buen Samaritano” y está conformada por 08 mujeres emprendedoras y solidarias dedicadas a diversas actividades de comercio. Reyna de 34 años es casada con 01 hijo menor de edad. Con los deseos de surgir Reyna inicia su negocio, la cual actualmente se dedica al tejido de chompas, chalinas, guantes y colchas. Comenzó con una máquina pues más adelante con sus ahorros  y  la ayuda de su pareja puedo comprar 02 máquinas más. Se siente feliz  pues gracias a su esfuerzo a podido mejorar su vivienda.  Reyna solicitó el crédito para la compra de su cuarta máquina de coser, pues esto le facilitará realizar su trabajo. Su mayor deseo es de formar su propio taller de tejido. El grupo “El Buen Samaritano” agradecen a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Reyna es la primera del lado derecho, viste polo morado y casaca beige.
texts.en:
Reyna is a member of the "El Buen Samaritano" (The Good Samaritan) group, which is made up of 8 hardworking, caring women who work in various fields.  Reyna is 34 years old, is married, and has 1 young son.  Desiring to get ahead, Reyna started her own business, which currently involves sewing sweaters, scarves, gloves, and quilts.  She started with one sewing machine and later on (with her savings and help from her husband) she was able to buy 2 more machines.  She is happy because thanks to her efforts, she has been able to improve her home.

Reyna is asking for a loan to buy her 4th sewing machine, since this will make it easier for her to carry out her work.  Her greatest desire is to start her own sewing shop.

The "El Buen Samaritano" group thanks all those who have made this loan possible and they are committed to continuing to work hard.  Reyna is the first person on the right, wearing a purple shirt and beige jacket.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: construct a fence for his yard.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee plantings.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new galvanized metal panels for fixing her roof, among other supplies.

loans.name: Gema Auxiliadora

texts.es: Doña Gema es originaria de la ciudad de Granada. Tiene 30 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijas. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a  elaboración y venta de comida. Empezó esta actividad a la edad de 15 años. Gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación logro pagar sus estudios a través de las ganancias obtenidas de su venta de comida, comercializa sus productos en su casa. Solicita este crédito para comprar: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, verduras entre otros con el fin de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, aumentar sus ventas y abtener mayores ingresos. Su plan futuro es tener una miscelánea en su casa.
texts.en:
Gema is originally from the city of Granada.  She is 30 years old, is married, and has two daughters.  She is a businesswoman and works preparing and selling food.  She started this job when she was 15 years old.  Thanks to her effort and dedication, she was able to pay for her education with what she made selling food.  She makes her food at her house.

She is asking for a loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, vegetables, and other things.  In this way, she will be able to satisfy her customers, increase her sales, and obtain greater income.  Her plan for the future is to start a shop in her house.

loans.use: buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Ufemia

texts.es: Ufemia de 56 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y a sus dos hijas de 9 años y 18 años; Siendo una mujer admirada por su familia y amigos se siente orgullosa de si misma y su familia. Ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad como huevos, leche, pan, macarrones entre otros. Es así como honradamente se gana la vida decentemente y posee muchos clientes ya que siempre trata de mantener la tienda surtida. Ufemia desea cambiar el techo de donde vive ya que tiene 19 años de vivir en su casa que es propia y por el tiempo ya se está dañando es por eso que desea reparar todo el techo de su vivienda, comprar tejas, cemento y arena. Cuenta con buenas referencias de pago.
texts.en:
Ufemia is 56 years old and lives with her husband and their two daughters, ages 9 and 18.  This woman is admired by her family and friends, which makes her feel proud.  Ufemia has a store where she sells basic necessities such as eggs, milk, bread, macaroni, and other products.  This allows her to make an honest and decent living.  She has many customers since she always tries to keep her store stocked.  

Ufemia wants to replace the roof of her home.  She has lived in her own house for 19 years and it has sustained damage over time.  For this reason, she wants repair the entire roof of her house.  She will buy tiles, cement, and sand.  Ufemia has good payment references.

loans.use: to buy tiles, cement, and sand for repairing the roof of her house.

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
Doña Paula es una mujer de 45 años de edad luchadora con un grado de escolaridad de primaria no completada es madre de 1 hijo el cual vive en bajo su techo de habitación siendo ellos tres los únicos que se involucran en las diferentes actividades del campo. Ella trabaja en la agricultura en lo que es la siembra de hortalizas (papa, brócoli y coliflor) que además practica en ocasiones la siembra de maíz y frijol. Dichas actividades las aprendió de sus padres quienes son agricultores desde toda una vida. Sus cultivos están ubicados a una distancia de 5 minutos de camino de su casa de habitación al cual se trasladan en familia. Su producto es comercializado a través de intermediarios que llegan a la zona, vecinos y amigos que conocen de su producto; pero como toda siembra y cultivo no deja de tener riesgo siendo estos las plagas y la variación de precios en el mercado. 

Actualmente solicita ayuda para poder invertir en la siembra de papa comprando semilla certificada ya que es más segura higiénica y limpia, por medio de esto ella podrá aumentar sus cultivos y obtener una mejor ganancia del mismo.

Su sueño es poder mejorar su vivienda, comprar con las ganancias otra clase de semillas para poder cultivar más hortaliza y poder brindar una variedad a sus clientes para su compra/venta.
texts.en:
Paula is a hardworking 45-year-old woman.  She went to first grade in elementary school but didn't finish it.  She has one son who lives under her roof.  The three of them are the only ones who are involved in the various farming endeavors that they do.  She works in farming in what is known as planting vegetables (potatoes, broccoli, and cauliflower).  In addition, at times she plants corn and beans.  She learned this profession from her parents, who have been farmers their whole lives.

Her crops are located 5 minutes from her house and she and her family walk there.  Her harvest is sold to neighbors and friends and also via distributors that come to the area.  However, like every harvest, there are always risks due to disease and price changes.

Currently, she is asking for help so she can invest in her potato crop by buying certified seed, since it is safer, healthier, and cleaner.  In this way, she will be able to increase her harvest and obtain a greater income from it.

Her dream is to be able to improve her home, use her income to buy another type of seed so she can grow more vegetables and be able to offer variety to her customers.

loans.use: buy farming supplies for her vegetable crops.

loans.name: Patricia Arely

texts.es: Patricia Arely de 25 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y su pequeño hijo; Es una mujer muy visionaria que lo da y entrega todo por su familia, es trabajadora, servicial, respetuosa y muy emprendedora. Desde hace ya 10 años reside en casa humilde pero propia y poco a poco la ha ido construyendo ya que ella dice que le estará brindando una buena vivienda a su hijo. Ella se gana la vida vendiendo pan de dulce, y a la vez vende sandalias. Su esposo trabaja como motorista. Patricia desea con tanto esmero pavimentar el piso de su vivienda actualmente el piso es de tierra y para la salud y comodidad de su familia hará todo el esfuerzo para hacerlo, es por eso que solicita a FUSAI un préstamo para la compra de cemento, arena, grava entre otros, y así está mas que segura que su familia estará muy contenta con la realización de este sueño.
texts.en: Patricia Arely, 25, lives with her husband and their small son. She is a very visionary women who gives everything for her family; she is hard-working, helpful, considerate and very enterprising. For 10 years she has been living in a house that is very humble but is her own and little by little she has been adding to it since she says that she will be providing a good home to her son. She earns a living selling pan de dulce [sweet breads/pastries] and selling sandals at the same time.Her husband works as a driver. Patricia wants to carefully pave the floor of her house. Right now the floor is dirt and for her family's health and comfort she will work hard to complete this. This is why she is seeking a loan from FUSAI for the purchase of cement, sand, gravel, etc. She is quite certain that her family will be very happy with the fulfillment of this dream.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, etc. in order to pave the floor of her home.

loans.name: Mónica Liliana

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Machala.  Empezó su actividad a raíz de su último embarazo, porque necesitaba tener ingresos y su esposo le ayuda a colocar una tienda y comedor, con el cual se ha mantenido hasta el día de hoy.  Trabaja 3 días a la semana en la venta de comida y los demás días se dedica a la venta de zapatos y cosméticos.  Es casada y su esposo trabaja como carnicero.  Tiene 4 hijos, quienes estudian en la escuela fiscal del sector.  Aspira en un futuro a tener el negocio en su casa, mantener el restaurante en el mercado de la ciudad y que sus hijos estén siempres saludales.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Machala.  She started her business after her last pregnancy because she needed income.  Her husband helped her set up a store and a diner, both of which she has managed to this very day.  She works three days a week selling food and on the other days she sells shoes and cosmetics.  The borrower is married and her husband works as a butcher.  They have four children who attend a state school in the neighborhood.  

In the future, she aspires to have a business in her house, maintain a restaurant in the city market, and see that her children remain healthy.

loans.use: to buy shoes, cosmetics, and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Amanda

texts.en: Amanda is 28 years old and lives in Long Town with her husband and two children, ages 8 and 15, who are in school. She has been running a shop where she sells cold water, soft drinks and other items. She says with her business, she is able to send her children to school. She started this business by selling for her friends. She is requesting a loan to buy more water by sack and soft drinks for her business. Her plans are to expand her business even more and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more water by sack and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Meet Kadiatu. She is a 41-year-old from Waterloo, eastern area in Sierra Leone. She is married with three children between the ages of 12 years and 19 years. Two of her children are currently attending school. 

In 2005, Kadiatu established her local food business within the Waterloo community. She began her business because she did not go to school and was forced into early marriage, so she decided to empower herself with business. She works at the business from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m., seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is the price inflation of goods.

Kadiatu requires a loan in order to purchase more local food like ground nuts, gari [cassava flakes] and beans. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to become more successful and pay her children's school fees. In the future, Kadiatu plans to become a supplier of local goods. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more local food like ground nuts, gari [cassava flakes] and beans.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Meet Fatmata. She is a 43-year-old from Waterloo, eastern area in Sierra Leone. She is married with two children. She has two additional dependents at home. In 2003, Fatmata established a restaurant business within the Waterloo community. She began this business because she wanted to create a permanent source of income to support her children. She works at the business from 10:00 a.m. until 12:00 p.m., six days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is the price inflation of goods.

Fatmata requires a loan in order to purchase more soft drinks, beer, bagged rice and cooking seasonings. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to become more successful and pay her children's school fees. In the future, Fatmata plans to expand her restaurant to a higher level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, beer, bagged rice and cooking seasonings.

loans.name: Matrisah

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 30-year-old Matrisah from Jui eastern area in Freetown. She is married with 4 children between the ages of 3 years and 13 years old. Two of her children are attending school. She started her business because she dropped out of school at an early age and she doesn’t want to be idle.  

Matrisah runs a provision shop; she sells milk, sugar, ovaltine, mayonnaise, and drinks. She has been running this business since 2005. She works at the business seven day per week, twelve hours per day.  Matrisah says that the main challenge to her business is transporting goods from the city to her business place, which is very difficult.

Matrisah has requested a loan in order to purchase food items including milk, sugar, ovaltine, mayonnaise, and drinks for resale. The extra income from this loan will allow her to buy a plot of land and renovate her house. In the future, she plans to expand her business more than ever. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase food items including milk, sugar, ovaltine, mayonnaise, and drinks for resale.

loans.name: Rosa Marleni

texts.es: Rosa de 32 años de edad vive junto a su familia, su esposo y sus tres pequeños hijos de 2, 3 y 13 años. Es una mujer muy trabajadora que siempre ha velado por el interés de su familia, desde hace ya 3 años vive en casa humilde pero propia y está muy contenta porque poco a poco ha ido mejorando. Rosa trabaja vendiendo conserva de coco, queso y chicharrón. Rosa desea con muchas ansias cambiar el techo de su hogar, ya que se aproximan lluvias y no está con las condiciones necesarias la teja que tiene su techo está muy deteriorada; es por eso que solicita a FUSAI un préstamo para la  construcción de dicho techo sustituyendo la teja por lamina galvanizada y clavos para techo entre otros. Espera realizar lo antes posible esta reparación así estarán más tranquilos sus pequeños hijos dentro de su casa.
texts.en:
32-year-old Rosa lives with her family, her husband and their three young children ages 2, 3 and 13. She is a very hardworking woman who always looks after the interests of her family. For the past three years they have been living in a humble home, but she is very happy as they have slowly been improving it. Rosa has a business selling coconut preserves, cheese, and pork products. 

Rosa is very anxious to repair the roof of her home. The tiles are badly damaged and the roof is not in a good condition to withstand the approaching rains. This is why she has approached FUSAI to request a loan, which will be used to repair the roof and replace the tiles with galvanized metal sheets and roofing nails, among others. She hopes to be able to make these repairs as soon as possible, so that her children will be more comfortable at home.

loans.use: Replacing the tiled roof with galvanized metal sheets and roofing nails, among others.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos Alberto de cuarenta y dos  años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida de 39 años, su hijo de 1 año y una hija de 16 años en casa propia, él es mecánico automotriz y además para complementar gastos vende granos básicos, maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de experiencia en su labor y eso le ha dado la oportunidad de llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar; Carlos es un hombre entregado a su trabajo, desea que los miembros de su familia vivan en mejores condiciones, en un hogar seguro y un poco más amplio, quiere continuar la construcción de un cuarto que dejó incompleto necesita terminar las paredes, poner ventanas, techo, puerta y piso hasta donde alcance, quiere realizarlo lo más pronto posible pero no posee de capital suficiente que abarque los costos de los materiales, por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, arena, ladrillo para piso, ventanas, lamina, polines, entre otros. Carlos tiene buenas referencias de pago, se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda y está muy agradecido con la ayuda.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto is a 42-year old man who lives with his life partner (39 years old), his 1 year-old son and his 16-year old daughter. He works as an automotive mechanic and also sells basic grains, such as corn and beans, to generate additional income. He has several years of experience, which has allowed him to bring home the bacon every day. 

Carlos is a hard-working man and wants his family to have the best possible quality of life in a safe house. He wants to finish an extra room that is incomplete and needs walls, windows, ceiling, floor and a door. However, he does not have enough capital to invest, which is why he is requesting a loan to FUSAI to buy cement, sand, bricks for the floor, windows, layers and steel bars, among others. Carlos has good payment references, has committed to settle his debt and is very grateful for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks for the floor, windows, layers and steel bars.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 33-year-old Mariama from Waterloo, in the Eastern area in Freetown. She is married with two children between the ages of 7 years and 14 years. Her children are going to school. She attended school up to class six and because of the death of her mother she decided to start a business to support her younger sister and brother.   

Mariama runs a general merchandise store. She sells milk, sugar, cigarettes, pure water and drinks. She has been running this business for 15 years. She works at the business seven days, twelve hours per day.  Mariama says that the main challenge to her business is that transporting her goods from the city to her business place is very difficult.

Mariama has requested a loan in order to purchase items including milk, sugar, cigarettes, pure water and drinks for resale. The extra income from this loan will allow her to buy a plot of land and renovate her house. In the future, she plans to open a big provision shop. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase items such as milk, sugar, cigarettes, pure water and drinks to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of cassava to increase her current inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of stationery and other office supplies.

loans.name: Abdelhamid

texts.en:
Abdelhamid is a 24-year-old single man from Rafah city. He owns a small mobile phone shop where he sell mobiles and provides maintenance service for his customers. He is a well-known man in his city and has loyal customers. A few years ago, his store was a simple one, but now, he works hard to grow and improve his income.

Abdelhamid requested a loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more mobile phones to resell in his store. This will improve his business and also his income.

Abdelhamid appears in the photo while he was in his store.

loans.use: to buy more mobile phones to resell in his store.

loans.name: Nawal

texts.en:
Nawal is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her son appears in the photo in front of their supermarket.

Nawal is a 50-year-old married woman from Rafah city. She lives with her husband and son in a small house in the city. Her son is still a student in the university. Nawal and her husband own a small supermarket in a crowded area in Rafah. It is very profitable but because of high family expenses, they can't improve their business. 

Nawal took a loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more products that customers frequently order. This will improve the supermarket's conditions and also increase their income.

loans.use: to buy more products that customers frequently order in her supermarket.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 34-year-old married man from Rafah city. He is a father for three young children, two sons and one daughter. Ahmad is an employee in the public sector. He gets a low income which is not enough to cover all the family needs.

Ahmad took a loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a water purification machine for the family home. By applying this loan, Ahmad can provide pure water for his kids and prevent them from pollution and disease.

Ahmad appears in the photo at home.

loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for the family home.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 33-year-old married man from Rafah city. He is a father of seven young children, four sons and three daughters. Mohammad is an employee in the public sector. He gets a low income which is not enough to cover all the family needs. He also works repairing electrical machines and home appliances.

Mohammad took a loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a water purification machine for the family home. By applying this loan, Mohammad can provide pure water for his kids and prevent them from pollution and disease. 

Mohammad appears in the photo at the home appliance store.

loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for the family home.

loans.name: Sokunthea

texts.en: Sokunthea is 26 years old. She is married and lives in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been running a tailoring shop for more than two years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband sells palm thatches. He earns about $1 each day. Her child is employed in a garment factory and earns about $4 per day. In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Sokunthea is requesting a loan of $300 to purchase more palm thatches to resell. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a bigger house.

loans.use: to purchase more palm thatches to resell.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo is 34 years old from Ozamiz City. He is married with one child. He earns a living through motorcycle transport. He earns Php 14,000 a month. 

He has seek a loan from PMPC to purchase another motorcycle for transport. In the future, he wants to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy an additional motorcycle for transport.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
Felix es un profesional de 34 años, está casado con Marleni y tiene 2 hijos con quienes vive en su casa alquilada. Felix tiene una farmacia y lleva mas de 5 años con su negocio, donde ofrece a sus clientes una diversa variedad de medicamentos de marca con la intención de aportar por el bienestar y la salud de su localidad. Asimismo también tiene a la venta  diversa variedad de artículos para bebes, entre otros.
Tiene la facilidad de contar con un local amplio y adecuado para su negocio ya que el propietario es un familiar suyo. Cuenta siempre con el apoyo de su esposa quien también tiene conocimientos en el rubro logrando así desempeñar su negocio de manera familiar. Desea contar con capital de trabajo que le permita adquirir un nuevo lote de medicinas en general tanto como de marca como genéricos, así como la compra de insumos que complementen los servicios generales que ofrece. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está ocasión desea contar con  2,000 nuevos soles para realizar la compra de de medicamentos al por mayor de marca y genéricos y así abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Felix, 34, is a professional and married to Marleni with whom he has two children. They live together in a rented house. For the past five years, Felix has had a pharmacy business which offers clients a diverse range of brand name medicines, with the intent to improve welfare and health in his neighborhood. He also sells a variety of baby products, among other items.

Felix has the advantage of having a large premises for his business, as the owner is a relative of his. He can always count on the support of his wife, who is able to assist as she also has expertise in the industry and is familiar with the business. Felix requires working capital so that he can purchase a new batch of branded and generic medicines, as well as other items to supplement the general services he offers.

This is his second loan with Kiva, and he is grateful for the financial support he has received to help him progress. He agrees to comply with the repayment schedule. This time, Felix has requested a loan of 2,000 soles to invest in branded and generic wholesale medicines to stock his business.

loans.use: to purchase medicines

loans.name: Apiza

texts.ru: Апиза 57 лет,разведена, одна воспитывает 2 детей. У Апизы - высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, Апиза занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 24 года назад, с покупки скота на 8,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Апизы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 30 овец, а также имеет земельный надел размером 1,5 ГА, на которой она ежегодно выращивает: кукурузу, подсолнечник, картофель. Дополнительным доходом являются заработки старшего сына, который находится в России. Он ежемесячно высылает свою зарплату матери для поддержания семьи. Ежемесячный доход Апизы составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Апиза обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров с дальнейшим откормом и перепродажей. Доходы от кредита Апиза планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Apiza is 57 years old, divorced and is raising two children. Apiza has higher education. She does animal husbandry as a main source of income for her family which she started 24 years ago with the purchase of cattle for an amount of 8,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work Apiza now has four milk cows, thirty sheep and also a plot of land in the size of 1.5 hectares where he annually grows corn, sunflower and potatoes. The additional source of income comes from her oldest son who is working in Russia. He sends his salary to his mother monthly to support the family. Apiza's monthly income is 10,000 KGS. With the purpose to further grow her business Apiza has come to the microfinance bank Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 80,000 KGS to buy cows for feeding and resale. She plans to invest the income from the loan into further increase of the headcount of livestock and plans to save money to repair the house.

loans.use: to buy cows for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en: Marites is 33 years old and is married with two children. She supports her family through her simple general store business situated in front of their home. She has been in this business for five years. Marites is requesting to take a loan amounting to PHP 7,000 to buy grocery items such as beverages, condiments, and assorted breads to sell. She hopes that she can lift up her children out of poverty and she also hopes that she can obtain her desired loan to further improve her business.

loans.use: to buy grocery items such as beverages, condiments, and assorted breads to sell.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en: Evangeline is known as a responsible mother of one child. She is 24 and has this strong determination in lifting up her family from poor living with her fruits and vegetables business. She is married to Johnny, a farmer in their village of Mabbayad. She commonly sells bananas in their village, for two years and six months to be exact. As of now, she is requesting a loan to buy more bananas to resell. She believes that through her patience and sacrifices in making the business grow, she'll have a viable and profitable source of income.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to resell.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en: Analyn is 37 years old and lives in Bontod, Larena, Siquijor. She is married with four children who are school-aged. To earn a living, Analyn has engaged in video-k activity. She earns about PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. Analyn has requested a loan amounting to PHP 30,000 to be used in purchasing additional video-k equipment such as microphones, chairs and tables. Analyn is a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Analyn hopes to expand her business with this institution.

loans.use: to purchase additional video-k equipment such as microphones, chairs and tables.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan Antonio de veintitrés años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida en casa propia, el trabaja de albañil a tiempo completo y además pinta algunas casas donde lo contratan y así complementa los gastos del hogar, desde hace algún tiempo necesita invertir en la construcción de un nuevo cuarto para el bebe que esperan pues desean darle la mayor comodidad y seguridad; quiere invertir pero no posee de suficiente capital que logre completar el gasto pues debido a su baja condición económica es muy difícil, por eso se decidió solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar, el cemento, ladrillos, arena, entre otros. Juan Antonio tiene buenas referencias de pago de parte de sus conocidos, se compromete a cancelar la deuda en el tiempo establecido, está muy contento y agradece la ayuda.
texts.en:
Juan Antonio, 23, lives together with his life partner in a house of their own. He works full-time as a mason. He also gets hired to paint houses, which helps him complement what is left to cover the home expenses.

For some time now, he has had the need to invest in the construction of a new room for the baby they are expecting. They want to give her/him a comfortable and safe place to live in. He does not have enough money to do so and his financial situation is tough. This is why he decided to request a loan at FUSAI to buy cement, bricks and sand, among other materials. Juan Antonio’s acquaintances give good references of his payment record. He promises to pay the loan according to plan. He feels very happy and appreciates the help he is receiving.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks and sand to build a room for his child.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Víctor Manuel de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su madre en casa propia desde hace once años. El se dedica a la venta de especies, curtido, y dulces por mayor, tiene varios años con el negocio y aunque no es muy regular le ayuda a ganarse el sustento de cada día; es un hombre decidido, trabajador y muy responsable siempre está a la expectativa de oportunidades que le permitan salir adelante, el vive en una zona rural muy humilde y desde hace algún tiempo desea terminar de construir un cuarto que dejó incompleto necesita un techo, piso y puerta, tiene toda la disposición de iniciar de nuevo el trabajo pero no cuenta con el capital suficiente debido a su baja condición económica por eso se decidió a solicitarle a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar lamina galvanizada, ladrillo de piso, una puerta entre otros. Víctor Manuel  está muy contento y agradeció con la ayuda y espera responder bien con cada pago.
texts.en:
Víctor Manuel, 42, has been living together with his life partner and his mother in a house of their own for eleven years. He sells spices, curtido [a salad made out of cabbage] and candies in bulk. He has been doing this for a couple of years and even if the business has its ups and downs, he makes a living out of it.

He is a determined, hardworking and responsible man, always looking for opportunities to get ahead. He lives in a humble rural area and has been thinking for some time to finish building a room he left unfinished; it needs a roof, floor and a door.

He is eager to start again but does not have the money, since his financial situation is tough. This is why he decided to request a loan at FUSAI to buy galvanized metal sheets, floor tiles and a door, among other things. Víctor Manuel feels very happy and appreciates the help he is receiving. He hopes to pay the installments on time.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, floor tiles and a door to finish a room.

loans.name: Expedita

texts.en:
Expedita is 48 years old and lives in Poblacion, San Juan, Siquijor. She is married with adult aged-children. To earn a living, Expedita has engaged in vegetable vending activity. She earns about PHP 25,000 each month doing this type of work. Expedita has requested a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to be used in purchasing additional vegetables such as cabbages, carrots, string beans etc.

Expedita is a new member of PMPC. In the future, she hopes to expand her business with this institution.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables such as cabbages, carrots, string beans etc.

loans.name: Rosa Mabel

texts.es: Rosa Mabel de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos uno de 12 y de 10 y uno de 8 años, habitan casa propia desde hace 10 años. Ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad y su esposo le ayuda a complementar gastos con su taller de estructura metálica, con el tiempo han aprendido a ganarse el sustento diario; Rosa es una mujer activa, humilde y por supuesto emprendedora, a pesar de su baja condición económica siempre trabaja duro buscando que su familia tenga lo que necesita en el hogar, su vivienda requiere de la construcción de un sanitario,   pues en el cantón solo hay fosas y son menos seguras para sus hijos, quiere empezar el trabajo lo más pronto posible, pero no posee de capital por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, ladrillo, lamina, entre otros. Rosa Mabel está feliz con la ayuda, y se compromete a cancelarla.
texts.en:
Rosa Mabel, 36, lives with her common-law husband and their three children, ages 12, 10 and 8.  They have lived in their own house for ten years.  She runs a store where she sells essential items and her husband helps cover expenses with his metal structure workshop.  With time they have been able to earn a daily living.

Rosa is a very active, modest entrepreneur who, despite her low economic situation, has always worked hard to obtain what the family needs at home.  Her house is in need of a bathroom because in the local area there are only outhouses, which are less safe for her children.  She wants to start work as soon as possible but does not have the money to do so.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy cement, bricks, metal sheeting, etc.

Rosa Mabel is grateful for the support and committed to paying back the loan on time.

loans.use: To buy cement, bricks, metal sheeting.

loans.name: Chhen

texts.en:
Chhen is 50 years old. She is married and has four children. She is a farmer and has enough experience to manage this business since it is the major source of her income. As with other villagers, she chooses to grow rice crops because people use them every day, which results in a high demand for her products. She has been in this occupation for nearly 33 years and earns a net profit of $5 per day.

Chhen has never been with other state banks or MFIs before; this will be her first loan through Kiva and its partner, HKL. She is requesting a loan to build a latrine, and HKL has provided her with a special interest rate to encourage her to build a healthy family by releasing less pollutants. She appreciates all the help that Kiva lenders give her through HKL.

loans.use: to build a latrine.

loans.name: Filder

texts.es:
Filder tiene  33 años, esta casado con Delaida y tiene 2 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Filder se dedica a la venta de calzados en una feria dominical de su distrito donde al igual que otros comerciantes de prendas para vestir reciben a un sin numero de clientes quienes son personas del campo que llegan a la ciudad con el objetivo de realizar sus compras semanales. Se inició hace mas de 8 años motivado por su esposa ya que tenía la responsabilidad de velar por el bienestar de su familia. Fue así que uso dinero que había ahorrado hasta entonces trabajando en diversos oficios y compró su primer lote de calzados que vendió de manera ambulante. Tiempo después decidió incursionar como vendedor en la feria dominical de su distrito promovido por las autoridades de su localidad , logrando así consolidar su negocio en beneficio de su economía.
Podemos hallar en su puesto diversos zapatos y zapatillas para damas y caballeros, así como zapatitos para bebes y escolares. Se siente muy contento con su trabajo ya que le permite tener muy buenos ingresos económicos. Con el tiempo desea ampliar su negocio de calzados y convertirse en un proveedor mayorista.
Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está oportunidad desea contar con 3,000 nuevo soles para comprar mercadería tales como calzados para damas y niños; así como zapatillas para los agricultores.
texts.en:
Filder, 33, is married to Delaida and they have two children who live with them in their own home.  Filder sells shoes at the Sunday market in his district where other merchants sell clothing.  Many customers, including farmers, visit the city to make their weekly purchases.  Filder started his business eight years ago, encouraged by his wife, in order to take care of the family.  He used the money he had saved from working in different jobs to buy his first batch of shoes which he sold as a street vendor.  Later on he decided to sell his goods at the Sunday fair in his district which is organized by the local authorities.  He was able to consolidate his business which has helped his economy.

At his stall we can find different kinds of men's and women's shoes and slippers as well as baby and school children's shoes.  He is very happy with his work because he earns a good income.  Over time he wants to expand his business and become a wholesale supplier.

This is his second Kiva loan and he is grateful for the financial support and committed to paying back the loan on time.  This time he has requested 3,000 PEN to buy merchandise such as women's and children's shoes, and footwear for farmers.

loans.use: To buy women's and children's shoes, and farmer footwear.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine works hard to support her family. Josephine is single and has a tricycle transport business in the Philippines.

Josephine has requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy new tools and equipment for her tricycle.

Josephine has been in this business for one year now, and she also earns additional income from pig-fattening.

In the future, Josephine would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her tricycle.

loans.name: Sonia Natali

texts.es: Sonia Natali de veintiséis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos pequeños uno de 2 años y el otro de 4 años en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva, además  su esposo le ayuda a complementar los gastos del hogar, es agricultor siembra maíz y pipián, son una familia muy humilde y con pocos recursos económicos pero con su trabajo han logrado el sustento de cada día. Sonia es una mujer dinámica, responsable y muy audaz siempre está buscando oportunidades para salir adelante, su vivienda se encuentra ubicada en una zona rural y en esta época de lluvia necesita realizar reparaciones pues el techo está podrido y le causa inseguridad a los que la habitan, quiere empezar el trabajo lo más pronto posible, pero no posee de capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar lamina galvanizada. Sonia Natali está muy agradecida y espera poder cancelar la deuda.
texts.en:
Sonia Natali, 26, lives with her common-law husband and their two small children, ages two and four, in their own house.  She sells new clothing and her husband, who is a farmer who grows corn and chili peppers, helps cover the household expenses.  They are a modest family with scarce economic resources, but with their work they are able to earn a daily living.  

Sonia is a dynamic, responsible, innovative woman who is always looking for opportunities to get ahead.  Her home is located in a rural area and because of the current rainy season she must repair the roof which has rotted out, making the home unsafe to live in.  She wants to start the work as soon as possible but does not have the money to do so.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy galvanized metal sheeting.  Sonia Natali is very grateful and hopes to be able to pay back the loan.

loans.use: To buy galvanized metal sheeting to fix her roof.

loans.name: Silvia Magdalena

texts.es: Silvia Magdalena de sesenta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia desde hace cuarenta años, ella es dueña de dos moto taxis, con las que trabaja 26 días al mes  además su esposo hace viajes para vender cal y con eso logran complementar gastos del hogar, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable, siempre está buscando alternativas que le den la oportunidad de salir adelante, desde hace algún tiempo necesita construir una pared de un cuarto que dejó incompleto y además quiere repellar las otras tres paredes para poder pintarlo, desea poder realizar este trabajo lo más rápido que se pueda, pues para ella es algo indispensable, pero no cuenta con la solvencia económica suficiente para costear los gastos, por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar los materiales cemento, grava, arena, etc. Silvia Magdalena se compromete a pagar toda la deuda con ayuda de su esposo ya que están muy agradecidos con la ayuda.
texts.en: Silvia Magdalena is sixty years old. She has lived with her life's companion in her own home for forty years. She is the owner of two motorcycle taxis which she works 26 days a month. In addition, her husband travels to sell lime, and with that they are able to pay the household expenses. She is a very hardworking and responsible woman. She is always seeking alternatives that will give her the opportunity to get ahead. For some time, she has needed to build a wall of a room that wasn't finished. She also wants to plaster the other three walls in order to paint the room. She wants to be able to do this work as soon as possible because for her it is really necessary, but she doesn't have enough financial solvency to pay for the expenses. That is why she is asking FUSAI for a loan that will allow her to buy materials such as cement, gravel, sand, etc. Silvia Magdalena is committed to paying off her whole debt with her husband's help, because they are very grateful for the help.

loans.use: construction of a wall, and buying cement, gravel and sand.

loans.name: Mercel

texts.en:
Mercel is 32 years old and married with one child.

Mercel works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Mercel has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from fishing and gasoline retailing.

Mercel aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rogelio Efigenio

texts.es: Rogelio de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus  cinco hijos en casa propia desde hace tres años. El es agricultor siembra maíz y pipián comercia en diferentes lugares de la zona, es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su trabajo y a su familia. Rogelio siempre ha buscado en la medida de sus posibilidades darles lo que necesitan por eso para tener un poco de mas espacio en el hogar decidió hacer un corredor  al frente de la casa además quiere construir una pared ya que se le mete el agua cada vez que llueve, desea empezar el trabajo lo más pronto posible pero debido a su condición económica no posee de capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar, ladrillo, piso,  cemento, arena, entre otros. Rogelio está muy contento con la ayuda y se siente comprometido a cancelar la deuda.
texts.en:
Rogelio, 49, lives with his common-law wife and their five children in their own home where they have been for three years.  He is a farmer who grows corn and chili peppers which he sells in different places in the area.  He is an entrepreneur who is dedicated to his work and family.  Rogelio is always looking for ways to give his family what they need.  He wants to add more space at home and has decided to build a hall along the front of the house as well as as a wall to keep out the water that gets in when it rains.  

He wants to start the work as soon as possible but does not have the money to do so.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand and other materials.  

Rogelio is very grateful for the support and committed to paying back the loan.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, and sand to build a wall.

loans.name: Emilia Estefany

texts.es: Emilia Estefany de veinte años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su madre en casa propia desde hace algún tiempo. Ella es una joven emprendedora, responsable y muy humilde, necesita poner en su vivienda dos puertas de hierro para mayor seguridad de los miembros del hogar, ya conoce un taller donde le darán buenos precios por hacerle las puertas y espera poder realizar lo más pronto posible pero no posee de capital suficiente que pueda costear los gastos por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar las puertas de hierro. Emilia Estefany está muy contenta con la ayuda y asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda.
texts.en: Emilia Estefany is twenty years old. She has lived with her life's companion and her mother in her own home for some time. She is an enterprising, responsible and very humble young woman. She needs to put two wrought iron doors on her home for more security for the household members. She already knows of a workshop that will give her good prices for making the doors. She hopes to be able to do it as soon as possible but she doesn't have enough capital to pay the expenses. That is why she is asking FUSAI for a loan that will allow her to buy the wrought iron doors. Emilia Estefany is very happy with the help and sure she can pay off the debt.

loans.use: to buy and install wrought iron doors.

loans.name: Mauricio Alejandro

texts.es: Mauricio Alejandro de cincuenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida en casa propia. Él es albañil y además vende verduras, su esposa le ayuda con el negocio,  son muy unidos, entre los dos han logrado salir adelante, Mauricio es un hombre entregado a su labor, muy responsable y sobre todo humilde, le gusta aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presentan, ahora quiere realizar algunas reparaciones en su vivienda las puertas están muy deterioradas y se ha vuelto inseguro para la familia, necesita comprar dos puertas nuevas de hierro pero no posee de capital que lo respalde, se decidió solicitarle a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar las puertas, ya que el solo no puede cubrir los gastos. Mauricio Antonio está muy contento y agradecido con la ayuda y asegura que podrá saldar toda la deuda.
texts.en: Mauricio Alejandro is fifty years old. He lives with his life's companion in his own house. He is a bricklayer and also sells vegetables. His wife helps him with the business. They are very united and between the two of them they are able to get ahead. Mauricio is a man who is dedicated to his work, very responsible and above all humble. He likes to take advantage of all of the opportunities that come his way. Now he wants to make some repairs on his house. The doors are very deteriorated and it has become unsafe for the family. He needs to buy two new wrought iron doors but he doesn't have capital to back him up. He decided to ask FUSAI for a loan that will allow him to buy the doors, since he can't cover the expenses himself. Mauricio Antonio is very happy and grateful with the help and sure he can pay off the debt.

loans.use: to buy and install two wrought iron gates.

loans.name: Alianza Emprendedora 2 Group

texts.es:
Efraín, tiene 60 años de edad, es casado tiene 4 hijos y vive con su esposa y uno de sus  hijos en el municipio de Yoro. Toda su vida ha sido agricultor dedicado al  cultivo de maíz y frijoles. La producción la vende en el mercado local de la zona. El ha solicitado ya 16 ciclos de préstamos en ODEF con el actual, el cual es por 7,000 lempiras y es en forma grupal. Con este préstamo comprar fertilizantes y semillas para siembra de maíz y frijoles. Su plan es llegar a tener su propio capital para seguir trabajando y ayudar a sus hijos con la educación.
El grupo se llama Alianza Emprendedora 2, esta formado por 8 miembros que viven en la misma comunidad y se dedican a la agricultura. El préstamo grupal es por 59,000 lempiras y lo utilizaran para comprar fertilizantes y semillas para sembrar maíz y frijoles para la venta. En la foto se identifican así: a la izquierda esta Efraín de camisa celeste manga larga, el de camisa Beige es José Ernesto, Saúl de camisa verde,  Ananías esta a la derecha de camisa rayada manga larga, en frente de camiseta negra es José Lucindo, Santiago de camisa celeste manga corta, José Estanislao tiene camisa cuadriculada y don Enrique de camisa manga corta rayada y pantalón blanco.
texts.en:
Efraín, 60, is married and has four children.  He lives with his wife and one of their children in the town of Yoro.  All of his life he has been a farmer, growing corn and beans.  He sells his produce at the local market in the area.  This will be his 16th loan through ODEF and with the communal bank; and it is for the amount of 7,000 HNL.  He will use the loan to buy seeds to plant corn and beans. His plan is to earn enough of his own money to continue working and help his children finish their education.

The communal bank "Alianza Emprendedora 2" is comprised of eight members who live in the same community and are farmers.  The group loan for 59,000 HNL will be used to buy fertilizers and seeds to plant corn and beans to sell.  In the photograph we see in the back row, from left to right:  Efraín in a light blue, long-sleeved shirt, José Ernesto in a beige shirt and Saúl in a green shirt.  To the right in a long-sleeved, striped shirt is Ananías.  In the front row from the left in a black shirt is José Lucindo, then Santiago in a short-sleeved light blue shirt, José Estanislado is wearing a plaid shirt and Enrique is wearing a short-sleeved striped shirt and white pants.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seeds to plant corn and beans.

loans.name: Frine

texts.es:
Frine tiene 34 años  , esta casada con Marcelino y tiene 2 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia.Frine se dedica a la agricultura en su terreno de 2 hectáreas. Se inició hace 7 años y desde entonces trata de obtener una buena calidad de sus cosechas con el apoyo de su esposo y de algunos trabajadores del lugar a quienes contrata para realizar tareas complicadas como el retiro de maleza y cosecha de las mazorcas.
En ocasiones cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos para tareas menores quienes se sienten muy orgullosos de sus padres. Para obtener un mejor resultado de sus cosechas fertiliza sus terrenos de cultivo con abono orgánico los cuales son muy buenos para el cacao, además de llevar una producción natural evitando el uso de abonos artificiales. Además de cosechar cacao, también posee en un área considerable de cafe, ya que obtiene buenas ganancias adicionales. Este es su tercer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está ocasión desea contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
